   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).

   31:          connect_node/1,

   33:          illegal_nodenames/1, hidden_node/1,
   34:          dyn_node_name/1,
   35:          epmd_reconnect/1,
   36: 	 setopts/1,

   38: 	 inet_dist_options_options/1,

   40: 
   41: 	 monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason/1,
   42: 	 monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason/1,
   43: 	 monitor_nodes_node_type/1,
   44: 	 monitor_nodes_misc/1,
   45: 	 monitor_nodes_otp_6481/1,
   46: 	 monitor_nodes_errors/1,
   47: 	 monitor_nodes_combinations/1,
   48: 	 monitor_nodes_cleanup/1,
   49: 	 monitor_nodes_many/1,
   50:          monitor_nodes_down_up/1,
   51:          dist_ctrl_proc_smoke/1,
   52:          dist_ctrl_proc_reject/1,
   53:          erl_uds_dist_smoke_test/1,
   54:          erl_1424/1, net_kernel_start/1, differing_cookies/1,
   55:          cmdline_setcookie_2/1, connection_cookie/1,
   56:          dyn_differing_cookies/1,
   57:          xdg_cookie/1,
   58:          allowed/1]).
   59: 
   60: %% Performs the test at another node.
   61: -export([get_socket_priorities/0,
   62:          get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option/1,
   63: 	 tick_cli_test/3, tick_cli_test1/3,
   64: 	 tick_serv_test/2, tick_serv_test1/1,
   65: 	 run_remote_test/1,
   66:          dyn_node_name_do/2,
   67:          epmd_reconnect_do/2,
   68: 	 setopts_do/2,
   69:          setopts_deadlock_test/2,
   70: 	 keep_conn/1, time_ping/1,
   71:          ddc_remote_run/2]).
   72: 
   73: -export([net_kernel_start_do_test/1]).
   74: 
   75: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   76: 
   77: -export([dist_cntrlr_output_test_size/2]).
   78: 
   79: -export([pinger/1]).
   80: 
   81: -export([start_uds_rpc_server/1]).
   82: 
   83: -define(DUMMY_NODE,dummy@test01).
   84: -define(ALT_EPMD_PORT, "12321").
   85: -define(ALT_EPMD_CMD, "epmd -port "++?ALT_EPMD_PORT).
   86: 
   87: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   88: %% The distribution is mainly tested in the big old test_suite.
   89: %% This test only tests the net_ticktime configuration flag.
   90: %% Should be started in a CC view with:
   91: %% erl -sname master -rsh ctrsh
   92: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   93: 
   94: suite() ->
   95:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   96:      {timetrap,{minutes,12}}].
   97: 
   98: all() -> 
   99:     [dist_ctrl_proc_smoke,
  100:      dist_ctrl_proc_reject,
  101:      tick, tick_intensity, tick_change, nodenames, hostnames,
  102:      illegal_nodenames, connect_node,
  103:      dyn_node_name,
  104:      epmd_reconnect,
  105:      hidden_node, setopts,
  106:      table_waste, net_setuptime, inet_dist_options_options,
  107:      net_ticker_spawn_options,
  108:      {group, monitor_nodes},
  109:      erl_uds_dist_smoke_test,
  110:      erl_1424, net_kernel_start,
  111:      {group, differing_cookies},
  112:      allowed
  113:      ].
  114: 
  115: groups() -> 
  116:     [{monitor_nodes, [],
  117:       [monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason,
  118:        monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason,
  119:        monitor_nodes_node_type, monitor_nodes_misc,
  120:        monitor_nodes_otp_6481, monitor_nodes_errors,
  121:        monitor_nodes_combinations, monitor_nodes_cleanup,
  122:        monitor_nodes_many,
  123:        monitor_nodes_down_up]},
  124:      {differing_cookies, [],
  125:       [differing_cookies,
  126:        cmdline_setcookie_2,
  127:        connection_cookie,
  128:        dyn_differing_cookies,
  129:        xdg_cookie]}].
  130: 
  131: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  132:     start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
  133:     Config.
  134: 
  135: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  136:     [slave:stop(N) || N <- nodes()],
  137:     kill_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
  138:     ok.
  139: 
  140: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  141:     Config.
  142: 
  143: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  144:     Config.
  145: 
  146: init_per_testcase(TC, Config) when TC == hostnames;
  147:                                    TC == nodenames ->
  148:     file:make_dir("hostnames_nodedir"),
  149:     file:write_file("hostnames_nodedir/ignore_core_files",""),
  150:     Config;
  151: init_per_testcase(epmd_reconnect, Config) ->
  152:     [] = os:cmd(?ALT_EPMD_CMD++" -relaxed_command_check -daemon"),
  153:     Config;
  154: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
  155:     Config.
  156: 
  157: end_per_testcase(epmd_reconnect, _Config) ->
  158:     os:cmd(?ALT_EPMD_CMD++" -kill"),
  159:     ok;
  160: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
  161:     ok.
  162: 
  163: connect_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  164:     Connected = nodes(connected),
  165:     true = net_kernel:connect_node(node()),
  166:     Connected = nodes(connected),
  167:     ok.
  168: 
  169: tick(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  170:     run_dist_configs(fun tick/2, Config).
  171: 
  172: tick(DCfg, Config) ->
  173:     tick_test(DCfg, Config, false).
  174: 
  175: tick_intensity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  176:     run_dist_configs(fun tick_intensity/2, Config).
  177: 
  178: tick_intensity(DCfg, Config) ->
  179:     tick_test(DCfg, Config, true).
  180: 
  181: tick_test(DCfg, _Config, CheckIntensityArg) ->
  182:     %%
  183:     %% This test case use disabled "connect all" so that
  184:     %% global wont interfere...
  185:     %%
  186: 
  187:     [Name1, Name2] = get_nodenames(2, dist_test),
  188: 
  189:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name1),
  190: 
  191:     case CheckIntensityArg of
  192:         true ->
  193:             %% Not for intensity test...
  194:             ok;
  195:         false ->
  196:             %% First check that the normal case is OK!
  197:             rpc:call(Node, erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_cli_test, [node(), 8000, 16000]),
  198: 
  199:             erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
  200:             receive
  201:                 {nodedown, Node} ->
  202:                     ct:fail("nodedown from other node")
  203:             after 30000 ->
  204:                     erlang:monitor_node(Node, false)
  205:             end,
  206:             ok
  207:     end,
  208: 
  209:     stop_node(Node),
  210: 
  211:     %% Now, set the net_ticktime for the other node to 12 secs.
  212:     %% After the sleep(2sec) and cast the other node shall destroy
  213:     %% the connection as it has not received anything on the connection.
  214:     %% The nodedown message should arrive within 8 < T < 16 secs.
  215: 
  216:     %% We must have two slave nodes as the slave mechanism otherwise
  217:     %% halts the client node after tick timeout (the connection is down
  218:     %% and the slave node decides to halt !!
  219: 
  220:     %% Set the ticktime on the server node to 100 secs so the server
  221:     %% node doesn't tick the client node within the interval ...
  222: 
  223:     {ok, ServNode} = start_node(DCfg, Name2,
  224: 				"-kernel net_ticktime 100 -connect_all false"),
  225:     rpc:call(ServNode, erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_serv_test, [Node, node()]),
  226: 
  227:     %% We set min/max a second lower/higher than expected since it takes
  228:     %% time for termination of the dist controller, delivery of messages,
  229:     %% scheduling of the process receiving nodedown, etc...
  230:     {IArg, Min, Max} = case CheckIntensityArg of
  231:                            false ->
  232:                                {"", 7000, 17000};
  233:                            true ->
  234:                                {" -kernel net_tickintensity 24", 10500, 13500}
  235:                        end,
  236:     
  237:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name1,
  238:                             "-kernel net_ticktime 12 -connect_all false" ++ IArg),
  239: 
  240:     rpc:call(Node, erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_cli_test, [ServNode, Min, Max]),
  241: 
  242:     spawn_link(erl_distribution_SUITE, keep_conn, [Node]),
  243: 
  244:     {tick_serv, ServNode} ! {i_want_the_result, self()},
  245: 
  246:     monitor_node(ServNode, true),
  247:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  248: 
  249:     receive
  250: 	{tick_test, T} when is_integer(T) ->
  251: 	    stop_node(ServNode),
  252: 	    stop_node(Node),
  253:             io:format("Result: ~p~n", [T]),
  254: 	    T;
  255: 	{tick_test, Error} ->
  256: 	    stop_node(ServNode),
  257: 	    stop_node(Node),
  258: 	    ct:fail(Error);
  259: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  260: 	    stop_node(ServNode),
  261: 	    ct:fail("client node died");
  262: 	{nodedown, ServNode} ->
  263: 	    stop_node(Node),
  264: 	    ct:fail("server node died")
  265:     end,
  266:     ok.
  267: 
  268: %% Checks that pinging nonexistyent nodes does not waste space in distribution table.
  269: table_waste(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  270:     run_dist_configs(fun table_waste/2, Config).
  271: 
  272: table_waste(DCfg, _Config) ->
  273:     {ok, HName} = inet:gethostname(),
  274:     F = fun(0,_F) -> [];
  275: 	   (N,F) -> 
  276: 		Name = list_to_atom("erl_distribution_"++integer_to_list(N)++
  277: 					"@"++HName),
  278: 		pang = net_adm:ping(Name),
  279: 		F(N-1,F)
  280: 	end,
  281:     F(256,F),
  282:     {ok, N} = start_node(DCfg, erl_distribution_300),
  283:     stop_node(N),
  284:     ok.
  285: 
  286: %% Test that starting nodes with different legal name part works, and that illegal
  287: %% ones are filtered
  288: nodenames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  289:     legal("a1@b"),
  290:     legal("a-1@b"),
  291:     legal("a_1@b"),
  292: 
  293:     %% Test that giving two -sname works as it should
  294:     started = test_node("a_1@b", false, long_or_short() ++ "a_0@b"),
  295: 
  296:     illegal("cdé@a"),
  297:     illegal("te欢st@a").
  298: 
  299: %% Test that starting nodes with different legal host part works, and that illegal
  300: %% ones are filtered
  301: hostnames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  302:     Host = gethostname(),
  303:     legal([$a,$@|atom_to_list(Host)]),
  304:     legal("1@b1"),
  305:     legal("b@b1-c"),
  306:     legal("c@b1_c"),
  307:     legal("d@b1#c"),
  308:     legal("f@::1"),
  309:     legal("g@1:bc3:4e3f:f20:0:1"),
  310: 
  311:     case file:native_name_encoding() of
  312:         latin1 -> ignore;
  313:         _ -> legal("e@b1é")
  314:     end,
  315:     long_hostnames(net_kernel:longnames()),
  316: 
  317:     illegal("h@testالع"),
  318:     illegal("i@языtest"),
  319:     illegal("j@te欢st").
  320: 
  321: long_hostnames(true) ->
  322:     legal("k@b.b.c"),
  323:     legal("l@b.b-c.d"),
  324:     legal("m@b.b_c.d"),
  325:     legal("n@127.0.0.1"),
  326:     legal("o@207.123.456.789");
  327: long_hostnames(false) ->
  328:     illegal("k@b.b.c").
  329: 
  330: legal(Name) ->
  331:     case test_node(Name) of
  332:         started ->
  333:             ok;
  334:         not_started ->
  335:             ct:fail("no ~p node started", [Name])
  336:     end.
  337: 
  338: illegal(Name) ->
  339:     case test_node(Name, true) of
  340:         not_started ->
  341:             ok;
  342:         started ->
  343:             ct:fail("~p node started with illegal name", [Name])
  344:     end.
  345: 
  346: test_node(Name) ->
  347:     test_node(Name, false).
  348: test_node(Name, Illegal) ->
  349:     test_node(Name, Illegal, "").
  350: test_node(Name, Illegal, ExtraArgs) ->
  351:     ProgName = ct:get_progname(),
  352:     Command = ProgName ++ " -noinput " ++
  353:         long_or_short() ++ Name ++ ExtraArgs ++
  354:         " -eval \"net_adm:ping('" ++ atom_to_list(node()) ++ "')\"" ++
  355:         case Illegal of
  356:             true ->
  357:                 " -eval \"timer:sleep(10000),init:stop().\"";
  358:             false ->
  359:                 ""
  360:         end,
  361:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
  362:     BinCommand = unicode:characters_to_binary(Command, utf8),
  363:     _Prt = open_port({spawn, BinCommand}, [stream,{cd,"hostnames_nodedir"}]),
  364:     Node = list_to_atom(Name),
  365:     receive
  366:         {nodeup, Node} ->
  367:             net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
  368:             slave:stop(Node),
  369:             started
  370:     after 5000 ->
  371:         net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
  372:         not_started
  373:     end.
  374: 
  375: long_or_short() ->
  376:     case net_kernel:longnames() of
  377:         true -> " -name ";
  378:         false -> " -sname "
  379:     end.
  380: 
  381: % get the localhost's name, depending on the using name policy
  382: gethostname() ->
  383:     Hostname = case net_kernel:longnames() of
  384:        true->
  385:            net_adm:localhost();
  386:        _->
  387:            {ok, Name}=inet:gethostname(),
  388:            Name
  389:     end,
  390:     list_to_atom(Hostname).
  391: 
  392: %% Test that pinging an illegal nodename does not kill the node.
  393: illegal_nodenames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  394:     run_dist_configs(fun illegal_nodenames/2, Config).
  395: 
  396: illegal_nodenames(DCfg, _Config) ->
  397:     {ok, Node}=start_node(DCfg, illegal_nodenames),
  398:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  399:     RPid=rpc:call(Node, erlang, spawn,
  400: 		  [?MODULE, pinger, [self()]]),
  401:     receive
  402: 	{RPid, pinged} ->
  403:             monitor_node(Node, false),
  404: 	    ok;
  405: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  406: 	    ct:fail("Remote node died.")
  407:     end,
  408:     stop_node(Node),
  409:     ok.
  410: 
  411: pinger(Starter) ->
  412:     io:format("Starter:~p~n",[Starter]),
  413:     net_adm:ping(a@b@c),
  414:     Starter ! {self(), pinged},
  415:     ok.
  416: 
  417: 
  418: %% Test that you can set the net_setuptime properly.
  419: net_setuptime(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  420:     run_dist_configs(fun net_setuptime/2, Config).
  421: 
  422: net_setuptime(DCfg, _Config) ->
  423: 
  424:     %% In this test case, we reluctantly accept shorter times than the given
  425:     %% setup time, because the connection attempt can end in a
  426:     %% "Host unreachable" error before the timeout fires.
  427: 
  428:     Res0 = do_test_setuptime(DCfg, "2"),
  429:     io:format("Res0 = ~p", [Res0]),
  430:     true = (Res0 =< 4000),
  431:     Res1 = do_test_setuptime(DCfg, "0.3"),
  432:     io:format("Res1 = ~p", [Res1]),
  433:     true = (Res1 =< 500),
  434:     ok.
  435: 
  436: do_test_setuptime(DCfg, Setuptime) when is_list(Setuptime) ->
  437:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, dist_setuptime_test,
  438:                             "-kernel net_setuptime " ++ Setuptime),
  439:     Res = rpc:call(Node,?MODULE,time_ping,[?DUMMY_NODE]),
  440:     stop_node(Node),
  441:     Res.
  442: 
  443: time_ping(Node) ->
  444:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  445:     pang = net_adm:ping(Node),
  446:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  447:     erlang:convert_time_unit(T1 - T0, native, millisecond).
  448: 
  449: %% Keep the connection with the client node up.
  450: %% This is necessary as the client node runs with much shorter
  451: %% tick time !!
  452: keep_conn(Node) ->
  453:     sleep(1),
  454:     rpc:cast(Node, erlang, time, []),
  455:     keep_conn(Node).
  456: 
  457: tick_serv_test(Node, MasterNode) ->
  458:     spawn(erl_distribution_SUITE, keep_conn, [MasterNode]),
  459:     spawn(erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_serv_test1, [Node]).
  460: 
  461: tick_serv_test1(Node) ->
  462:     register(tick_serv, self()),
  463:     TestServer = receive {i_want_the_result, TS} -> TS end,
  464:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  465:     receive
  466: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  467: 	    net_adm:ping(Node), %% Set up the connection again !!
  468: 
  469: 	    {tick_test, Node} ! {whats_the_result, self()},
  470: 	    receive
  471: 		{tick_test, Res} ->
  472: 		    TestServer ! {tick_test, Res}
  473: 	    end
  474:     end.
  475: 
  476: tick_cli_test(Node, Min, Max) ->
  477:     spawn(erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_cli_test1, [Node, Min, Max]).
  478: 
  479: tick_cli_test1(Node, Min, Max) ->
  480:     register(tick_test, self()),
  481:     erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
  482:     sleep(2),
  483:     rpc:call(Node, erlang, time, []), %% simulate action on the connection
  484:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  485:     receive
  486: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  487: 	    T2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  488: 	    receive
  489: 		{whats_the_result, From} ->
  490: 		    Diff = erlang:convert_time_unit(T2-T1, native,
  491: 						    millisecond),
  492: 		    case Diff of
  493: 			T when Min =< T, T =< Max ->
  494: 			    From ! {tick_test, T};
  495: 			T ->
  496: 			    From ! {tick_test,
  497: 				    {"T not in interval "
  498:                                      ++ integer_to_list(Min)
  499:                                      ++ " =< T =< "
  500:                                      ++ integer_to_list(Max),
  501: 				     T}}
  502: 		    end
  503: 	    end
  504:     end.
  505: 
  506: epmd_reconnect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  507:     NodeNames = [N1,N2,N3] = get_nodenames(3, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  508:     Nodes = [atom_to_list(full_node_name(NN)) || NN <- NodeNames],
  509: 
  510:     DCfg = "-epmd_port "++?ALT_EPMD_PORT,
  511: 
  512:     {_N1F,Port1} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N1, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  513: 					["epmd_reconnect_do", atom_to_list(node()), "1" | Nodes]),
  514:     {_N2F,Port2} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N2, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  515: 					["epmd_reconnect_do", atom_to_list(node()), "2" | Nodes]),
  516:     {_N3F,Port3} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N3, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  517: 					["epmd_reconnect_do", atom_to_list(node()), "3" | Nodes]),
  518:     Ports = [Port1, Port2, Port3],
  519: 
  520:     ok = reap_ports(Ports),
  521:    
  522:     ok.
  523: 
  524: reap_ports([]) ->
  525:     ok;
  526: reap_ports(Ports) ->
  527:     case (receive M -> M end) of
  528: 	{Port, Message} ->
  529:             case lists:member(Port, Ports) andalso Message of
  530:                 {data,String} ->
  531:                     io:format("~p: ~s\n", [Port, String]),
  532:                     reap_ports(Ports);
  533:                 {exit_status,0} ->
  534:                     reap_ports(Ports -- [Port])
  535:             end
  536:     end.
  537:     
  538: epmd_reconnect_do(_Node, ["1", Node1, Node2, Node3]) ->
  539:     Names = [Name || Name <- [hd(string:tokens(Node, "@")) || Node <- [Node1, Node2, Node3]]],
  540:     %% wait until all nodes are registered
  541:     ok = wait_for_names(Names),
  542:     "Killed" ++_ = os:cmd(?ALT_EPMD_CMD++" -kill"),
  543:     open_port({spawn, ?ALT_EPMD_CMD}, []),
  544:     %% check that all nodes reregister with epmd
  545:     ok = wait_for_names(Names),
  546:     lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  547:                           ANode = list_to_atom(Node),
  548:                           pong = net_adm:ping(ANode),
  549:                           {epmd_reconnect_do, ANode} ! {stop, Node1, Node}
  550:                   end, [Node2, Node3]),
  551:     ok;
  552: epmd_reconnect_do(_Node, ["2", Node1, Node2, _Node3]) ->
  553:     register(epmd_reconnect_do, self()),
  554:     receive {stop, Node1, Node2} ->
  555:             ok
  556:     after 7000 ->
  557:             exit(timeout)
  558:     end;
  559: epmd_reconnect_do(_Node, ["3", Node1, _Node2, Node3]) ->
  560:     register(epmd_reconnect_do, self()),
  561:     receive {stop, Node1, Node3} ->
  562:             ok
  563:     after 7000 ->
  564:             exit(timeout)
  565:     end.
  566: 
  567: wait_for_names(Names) ->
  568:     %% wait for up to 3 seconds (the current retry timer in erl_epmd is 2s)
  569:     wait_for_names(lists:sort(Names), 30, 100).
  570: 
  571: wait_for_names(Names, N, Wait) when N > 0 ->
  572:     try
  573:         {ok, Info} = erl_epmd:names(),
  574:         Names = lists:sort([Name || {Name, _Port} <- Info]),
  575:         ok
  576:     catch
  577:         error:{badmatch, _} ->
  578:             timer:sleep(Wait),
  579:             wait_for_names(Names, N-1, Wait)
  580:     end.
  581: 
  582: 
  583: dyn_node_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  584:     run_dist_configs(fun dyn_node_name/2, Config).
  585: 
  586: dyn_node_name(DCfg, _Config) ->
  587:     NameDomain = case net_kernel:get_state() of
  588:                      #{name_domain := shortnames} -> "shortnames";
  589:                      #{name_domain := longnames} -> "longnames"
  590:                  end,
  591:     {_N1F,Port1} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg,
  592:                                           undefined, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  593:                                           ["dyn_node_name_do", atom_to_list(node()),
  594:                                            NameDomain]),
  595:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port1),
  596:     ok.
  597: 
  598: dyn_node_name_do(TestNode, [NameDomainStr]) ->
  599:     nonode@nohost = node(),
  600:     [] = nodes(),
  601:     [] = nodes(hidden),
  602:     NameDomain = list_to_atom(NameDomainStr),
  603:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := undefined,
  604:      name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  605:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type,all}]),
  606:     net_kernel:connect_node(TestNode),
  607:     [] = nodes(),
  608:     [TestNode] = nodes(hidden),
  609:     MyName = node(),
  610:     false = (MyName =:= undefined),
  611:     false = (MyName =:= nonode@nohost),
  612:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := MyName,
  613:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  614:     check([MyName], rpc:call(TestNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden])),
  615: 
  616:     {nodeup, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]} = receive_any(),
  617:     {nodeup, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]} = receive_any(),
  618: 
  619:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(TestNode),
  620: 
  621:     %% We don't know the order of these nodedown messages. Often
  622:     %% nodedown from the connection comes first, but not always...
  623: 
  624:     NodedownMsgsA = lists:sort([{nodedown, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]},
  625:                                 {nodedown, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]}]),
  626:     NodedownMsgA1 = receive_any(),
  627:     NodedownMsgA2 = receive_any(),
  628:     NodedownMsgsA = lists:sort([NodedownMsgA1, NodedownMsgA2]),
  629: 
  630:     [] = nodes(hidden),
  631:     nonode@nohost = node(),
  632:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := undefined,
  633:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  634: 
  635:     net_kernel:connect_node(TestNode),
  636:     [] = nodes(),
  637:     [TestNode] = nodes(hidden),
  638:     MyName = node(),
  639:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := MyName,
  640:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  641: 
  642:     check([MyName], rpc:call(TestNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden])),
  643: 
  644:     {nodeup, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]} = receive_any(),
  645:     {nodeup, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]} = receive_any(),
  646: 
  647:     true = rpc:cast(TestNode, net_kernel, disconnect, [MyName]),
  648: 
  649:     %% We don't know the order of these nodedown messages. Often
  650:     %% nodedown from the connection comes first, but not always...
  651: 
  652:     NodedownMsgsB = lists:sort([{nodedown, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]},
  653:                                 {nodedown, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]}]),
  654:     NodedownMsgB1 = receive_any(),
  655:     NodedownMsgB2 = receive_any(),
  656:     NodedownMsgsB = lists:sort([NodedownMsgB1, NodedownMsgB2]),
  657: 
  658:     [] = nodes(hidden),
  659:     nonode@nohost = node(),
  660:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := undefined,
  661:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  662:     ok.
  663: 
  664: check(X, X) -> ok.
  665: 
  666: setopts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  667:     run_dist_configs(fun setopts/2, Config).
  668: 
  669: setopts(DCfg, _Config) ->
  670:     register(setopts_regname, self()),
  671:     [N1,N2,N3,N4,N5] = get_nodenames(5, setopts),
  672: 
  673:     {_N1F,Port1} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N1, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  674: 					["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()), "1", "ping"]),
  675:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port1),
  676: 
  677:     {_N2F,Port2} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N2, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  678: 				 ["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()), "2", "ping"]),
  679:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port2),
  680: 
  681:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{packet,2}, {active,false}]),
  682:     {ok, LTcpPort} = inet:port(LSock),
  683: 
  684:     {N3F,Port3} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N3, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  685: 					["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()),
  686: 					 "1", integer_to_list(LTcpPort)]),
  687:     wait_and_connect(LSock, N3F, Port3),
  688:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port3),
  689: 
  690:     {N4F,Port4} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N4, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  691: 					["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()),
  692: 					 "2", integer_to_list(LTcpPort)]),
  693:     wait_and_connect(LSock, N4F, Port4),
  694:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port4),
  695: 
  696:     %% net_kernel:setopts(new, _) used to be able to produce a deadlock
  697:     %% in net_kernel. GH-6129/OTP-18198
  698:     {N5F,Port5} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N5, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  699: 					["setopts_deadlock_test", atom_to_list(node()),
  700: 					 integer_to_list(LTcpPort)]),
  701:     wait_and_connect(LSock, N5F, Port5),
  702:     repeat(fun () ->
  703:                    receive after 10 -> ok end,
  704:                    erlang:disconnect_node(N5F),
  705:                    WD = spawn_link(fun () ->
  706:                                            receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  707:                                            exit({net_kernel_probably_deadlocked, N5F})
  708:                                    end),
  709:                    pong = net_adm:ping(N5F),
  710:                    unlink(WD),
  711:                    exit(WD, kill),
  712:                    false = is_process_alive(WD)
  713:            end,
  714:            200),
  715:     try
  716:         erpc:call(N5F, erlang, halt, [])
  717:     catch
  718:         error:{erpc,noconnection} -> ok
  719:     end,
  720:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port5),
  721: 
  722:     unregister(setopts_regname),
  723:     ok.
  724: 
  725: wait_and_connect(LSock, NodeName, NodePort) ->
  726:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
  727:     {ok, "Connect please"} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  728:     flush_from_port(NodePort),
  729:     pong = net_adm:ping(NodeName),
  730:     gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Connect done"),
  731:     gen_tcp:close(Sock).
  732: 
  733: 
  734: flush_from_port(Port) ->
  735:     flush_from_port(Port, 10).
  736: 
  737: flush_from_port(Port, Timeout) ->
  738:     receive
  739: 	{Port,{data,String}} ->
  740: 	    io:format("~p: ~s\n", [Port, String]),
  741: 	    flush_from_port(Port, Timeout)
  742:     after Timeout ->
  743: 	    timeout
  744:     end.
  745: 
  746: wait_for_port_exit(Port) ->
  747:     case (receive M -> M end) of
  748: 	{Port,{exit_status,Status}} ->
  749: 	    Status;
  750: 	{Port,{data,String}} ->
  751: 	    io:format("~p: ~s\n", [Port, String]),
  752: 	    wait_for_port_exit(Port)
  753:     end.
  754: 
  755: run_remote_test([FuncStr, TestNodeStr | Args]) ->
  756:     Status = try
  757: 	io:format("Node ~p started~n", [node()]),
  758: 	TestNode = list_to_atom(TestNodeStr),
  759: 	io:format("Node ~p spawning function ~p~n", [node(), FuncStr]),
  760: 	{Pid,Ref} = spawn_monitor(?MODULE, list_to_atom(FuncStr), [TestNode, Args]),
  761: 	io:format("Node ~p waiting for function ~p~n", [node(), FuncStr]),
  762: 	receive
  763: 	    {'DOWN', Ref, process, Pid, normal} ->
  764: 		0;
  765: 	    Other ->
  766: 		io:format("Node ~p got unexpected msg: ~p\n",[node(), Other]),
  767: 		1
  768: 	end
  769:     catch
  770: 	C:E:S ->
  771: 	    io:format("Node ~p got EXCEPTION ~p:~p\nat ~p\n",
  772: 		      [node(), C, E, S]),
  773: 	    2
  774:     end,
  775:     io:format("Node ~p doing halt(~p).\n",[node(), Status]),
  776:     erlang:halt(Status).
  777: 
  778: % Do the actual test on the remote node
  779: setopts_do(TestNode, [OptNr, ConnectData]) ->
  780:     [] = nodes(),
  781:     {Opt, Val} = opt_from_nr(OptNr),
  782:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(new, [{Opt, Val}]),
  783: 
  784:     [] = nodes(),
  785:     {error, noconnection} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  786: 
  787:     case ConnectData of
  788: 	"ping" ->  % We connect
  789: 	    net_adm:ping(TestNode);
  790: 	TcpPort -> % Other connect
  791: 	    {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect("localhost", list_to_integer(TcpPort),
  792: 					 [{active,false},{packet,2}]),
  793: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Connect please"),
  794: 	    {ok, "Connect done"} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  795: 	    gen_tcp:close(Sock)
  796:     end,
  797:     [TestNode] = nodes(),
  798:     {ok, [{Opt,Val}]} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  799:     {error, noconnection} = net_kernel:getopts('pixie@fairyland', [Opt]),
  800: 
  801:     NewVal = change_val(Val),
  802:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(TestNode, [{Opt, NewVal}]),
  803:     {ok, [{Opt,NewVal}]} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  804: 
  805:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(TestNode, [{Opt, Val}]),
  806:     {ok, [{Opt,Val}]} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  807: 
  808:     ok.
  809: 
  810: setopts_deadlock_test(_TestNode, [TcpPort]) ->
  811:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect("localhost", list_to_integer(TcpPort),
  812:                                  [{active,false},{packet,2}]),
  813:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Connect please"),
  814:     {ok, "Connect done"} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  815:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
  816:     setopts_new_loop().
  817:     
  818: setopts_new_loop() ->
  819:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(new, [{nodelay, true}]),
  820:     receive after 10 -> ok end,
  821:     setopts_new_loop().
  822:     
  823: opt_from_nr("1") -> {nodelay, true};
  824: opt_from_nr("2") -> {nodelay, false}.
  825: 
  826: change_val(true)  -> false;
  827: change_val(false) -> true.
  828: 
  829: 
  830: start_node_unconnected(DCfg, Name, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  831:     start_node_unconnected(DCfg, Name, erlang:get_cookie(), Mod, Func, Args).
  832: 
  833: start_node_unconnected(DCfg, Name, Cookie, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  834:     FullName = full_node_name(Name),
  835:     CmdLine =
  836:         mk_node_cmdline(DCfg, Name, Cookie, Mod, Func, Args),
  837:     io:format("Starting node ~p: ~s~n", [FullName, CmdLine]),
  838:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, [exit_status]) of
  839: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
  840: 	    {FullName, Port};
  841: 	Error ->
  842: 	    exit({failed_to_start_node, FullName, Error})
  843:     end.
  844: 
  845: full_node_name(PreName) when is_atom(PreName) ->
  846:     full_node_name(atom_to_list(PreName));
  847: full_node_name(PreNameL) when is_list(PreNameL) ->
  848:     HostSuffix = lists:dropwhile(fun ($@) -> false; (_) -> true end,
  849: 				 atom_to_list(node())),
  850:     list_to_atom(PreNameL ++ HostSuffix).
  851: 
  852: mk_node_cmdline(DCfg, Name, Cookie, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  853:     Static = "-noinput",
  854:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  855:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
  856: 	       {ok,[[P]]} -> P;
  857: 	       _ -> exit(no_progname_argument_found)
  858: 	   end,
  859:     NameSw = case net_kernel:longnames() of
  860: 		 false -> "-sname ";
  861: 		 true -> "-name ";
  862: 		 _ -> exit(not_distributed_node)
  863: 	     end,
  864:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
  865:     NameStr = atom_to_list(Name),
  866:     Prog ++ " "
  867: 	++ Static ++ " "
  868: 	++ NameSw ++ " " ++ NameStr
  869:         ++ " " ++ DCfg
  870: 	++ " -pa " ++ Pa
  871: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
  872: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(Cookie)
  873: 	++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(Mod) ++ " " ++ atom_to_list(Func)
  874: 	++ " " ++ string:join(Args, " ").
  875: 
  876: 
  877: %% OTP-4255.
  878: tick_change(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  879:     run_dist_configs(fun tick_change/2, Config).
  880: 
  881: tick_change(DCfg, _Config) ->
  882:     %%
  883:     %% This test case use disabled "connect all" so that
  884:     %% global wont interfere...
  885:     %%
  886:     [BN, CN] = get_nodenames(2, tick_change),
  887:     DefaultTT = net_kernel:get_net_ticktime(),
  888:     unchanged = net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(DefaultTT, 60),
  889:     case DefaultTT of
  890: 	I when is_integer(I) -> ok;
  891: 	_                 -> ct:fail(DefaultTT)
  892:     end,
  893: 
  894:     %% In case other nodes are connected
  895:     case nodes(connected) of
  896: 	[] -> net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(10, 0);
  897: 	_ ->  rpc:multicall(nodes([this, connected]), net_kernel,
  898: 			    set_net_ticktime, [10, 5])
  899:     end,
  900: 
  901:     wait_until(fun () -> 10 == net_kernel:get_net_ticktime() end),
  902:     {ok, B} = start_node(DCfg, BN, "-kernel net_ticktime 10 -connect_all false"),
  903:     {ok, C} = start_node(DCfg, CN, "-kernel net_ticktime 10 -hidden"),
  904: 
  905:     OTE = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  906:     case catch begin
  907: 		   run_tick_change_test(DCfg, B, C, 10, 1),
  908: 		   run_tick_change_test(DCfg, B, C, 1, 10)
  909: 	       end of
  910: 	{'EXIT', Reason} ->
  911: 	    stop_node(B),
  912: 	    stop_node(C),
  913: 	    %% In case other nodes are connected
  914: 	    case nodes(connected) of
  915: 		[] -> net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(DefaultTT, 0);
  916: 		_ ->  rpc:multicall(nodes([this, connected]), net_kernel,
  917: 				    set_net_ticktime, [DefaultTT, 10])
  918: 	    end,
  919: 	    wait_until(fun () ->
  920: 			       DefaultTT == net_kernel:get_net_ticktime()
  921: 		       end),
  922: 	    process_flag(trap_exit, OTE),
  923: 	    ct:fail(Reason);
  924: 	_ ->
  925: 	    ok
  926:     end,
  927:     process_flag(trap_exit, OTE),
  928:     stop_node(B),
  929:     stop_node(C),
  930: 
  931:     %% In case other nodes are connected
  932:     case nodes(connected) of
  933: 	[] -> net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(DefaultTT, 0);
  934: 	_ ->  rpc:multicall(nodes([this, connected]), net_kernel,
  935: 			    set_net_ticktime, [DefaultTT, 5])
  936:     end,
  937: 
  938:     wait_until(fun () -> DefaultTT == net_kernel:get_net_ticktime() end),
  939:     ok.
  940: 
  941: 
  942: wait_for_nodedowns(Tester, Ref) ->
  943:     receive
  944: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  945: 	    io:format("~p~n", [{node(), {nodedown, Node}}]),
  946: 	    Tester ! {Ref, {node(), {nodedown, Node}}}
  947:     end,
  948:     wait_for_nodedowns(Tester, Ref).
  949: 
  950: run_tick_change_test(DCfg, B, C, PrevTT, TT) ->
  951:     [DN, EN] = get_nodenames(2, tick_change),
  952: 
  953:     Tester = self(),
  954:     Ref = make_ref(),
  955:     MonitorNodes = fun (Nodes) ->
  956: 			   lists:foreach(
  957: 			     fun (N) ->
  958: 				     monitor_node(N,true)
  959: 			     end,
  960: 			     Nodes),
  961: 			   wait_for_nodedowns(Tester, Ref)
  962: 		   end,
  963: 
  964:     {ok, D} = start_node(DCfg, DN, "-connect_all false -kernel net_ticktime "
  965: 			 ++ integer_to_list(PrevTT)),
  966: 
  967:     NMA = spawn_link(fun () -> MonitorNodes([B, C, D]) end),
  968:     NMB = spawn_link(B, fun () -> MonitorNodes([node(), C, D]) end),
  969:     NMC = spawn_link(C, fun () -> MonitorNodes([node(), B, D]) end),
  970: 
  971:     MaxTT = case PrevTT > TT of
  972: 		true  -> PrevTT;
  973: 		false -> TT
  974: 	    end,
  975: 
  976:     CheckResult = make_ref(),
  977:     spawn_link(fun () ->
  978: 		       receive
  979: 		       after (25 + MaxTT)*1000 ->
  980: 			       Tester ! CheckResult
  981: 		       end
  982: 	       end),
  983: 
  984:     %% In case other nodes than these are connected
  985:     case nodes(connected) -- [B, C, D] of
  986: 	[] -> ok;
  987: 	OtherNodes -> rpc:multicall(OtherNodes, net_kernel,
  988: 				    set_net_ticktime, [TT, 20])
  989:     end,
  990: 
  991:     change_initiated = net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(TT,20),
  992:     {ongoing_change_to,_} = net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(TT,20),
  993:     sleep(3),
  994:     change_initiated = rpc:call(B,net_kernel,set_net_ticktime,[TT,15]),
  995:     sleep(7),
  996:     change_initiated = rpc:call(C,net_kernel,set_net_ticktime,[TT,10]),
  997: 
  998:     {ok, E} = start_node(DCfg, EN, "-connect_all false -kernel net_ticktime "
  999: 			 ++ integer_to_list(TT)),
 1000:     NME  = spawn_link(E, fun () -> MonitorNodes([node(), B, C, D]) end),
 1001:     NMA2 = spawn_link(fun () -> MonitorNodes([E]) end),
 1002:     NMB2 = spawn_link(B, fun () -> MonitorNodes([E]) end),
 1003:     NMC2 = spawn_link(C, fun () -> MonitorNodes([E]) end),
 1004: 
 1005:     receive CheckResult -> ok end,
 1006: 
 1007:     unlink(NMA),  exit(NMA, kill),
 1008:     unlink(NMB),  exit(NMB, kill),
 1009:     unlink(NMC),  exit(NMC, kill),
 1010:     unlink(NME),  exit(NME, kill),
 1011:     unlink(NMA2), exit(NMA2, kill),
 1012:     unlink(NMB2), exit(NMB2, kill),
 1013:     unlink(NMC2), exit(NMC2, kill),
 1014: 
 1015:     %% The node not changing ticktime should have been disconnected from the
 1016:     %% other nodes
 1017:     receive {Ref, {Node, {nodedown, D}}} when Node == node() -> ok
 1018:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1019:     end,
 1020:     receive {Ref, {B, {nodedown, D}}} -> ok
 1021:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1022:     end,
 1023:     receive {Ref, {C, {nodedown, D}}} -> ok
 1024:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1025:     end,
 1026:     receive {Ref, {E, {nodedown, D}}} -> ok
 1027:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1028:     end,
 1029: 
 1030:     %% No other connections should have been broken
 1031:     receive
 1032: 	{Ref, Reason} ->
 1033: 	    stop_node(E),
 1034: 	    exit({?LINE, Reason});
 1035: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} when Pid == NMA;
 1036: 				   Pid == NMB;
 1037: 				   Pid == NMC;
 1038: 				   Pid == NME;
 1039: 				   Pid == NMA2;
 1040: 				   Pid == NMB2;
 1041: 				   Pid == NMC2 ->
 1042: 	    stop_node(E),
 1043: 
 1044: 	    exit({?LINE, {node(Pid), Reason}})
 1045:     after 0 ->
 1046: 	    TT = net_kernel:get_net_ticktime(),
 1047: 	    TT = rpc:call(B, net_kernel, get_net_ticktime, []),
 1048: 	    TT = rpc:call(C, net_kernel, get_net_ticktime, []),
 1049: 	    TT = rpc:call(E, net_kernel, get_net_ticktime, []),
 1050: 	    stop_node(E),
 1051: 	    ok
 1052:     end.
 1053: 
 1054: %%
 1055: %% Basic tests of hidden node.
 1056: %%
 1057: %% Basic test of hidden node.
 1058: hidden_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1059:     run_dist_configs(fun hidden_node/2, Config).
 1060: 
 1061: hidden_node(DCfg, Config) ->
 1062:     hidden_node(DCfg, "-hidden", Config),
 1063:     hidden_node(DCfg, "-hidden -hidden", Config),
 1064:     hidden_node(DCfg, "-hidden true -hidden true", Config),
 1065:     ok.
 1066: 
 1067: hidden_node(DCfg, HArgs, _Config) ->
 1068:     ct:pal("--- Hidden argument(s): ~s~n", [HArgs]),
 1069:     {ok, V} = start_node(DCfg, visible_node),
 1070:     VMN = start_monitor_nodes_proc(V),
 1071:     {ok, H} = start_node(DCfg, hidden_node, HArgs),
 1072:     %% Connect visible_node -> hidden_node
 1073:     connect_nodes(V, H),
 1074:     test_nodes(V, H),
 1075:     stop_node(H),
 1076:     sleep(5),
 1077:     check_monitor_nodes_res(VMN, H),
 1078:     stop_node(V),
 1079:     {ok, H} = start_node(DCfg, hidden_node, HArgs),
 1080:     HMN = start_monitor_nodes_proc(H),
 1081:     {ok, V} = start_node(DCfg, visible_node),
 1082:     %% Connect hidden_node -> visible_node
 1083:     connect_nodes(H, V),
 1084:     test_nodes(V, H),
 1085:     stop_node(V),
 1086:     sleep(5),
 1087:     check_monitor_nodes_res(HMN, V),
 1088:     stop_node(H),
 1089:     ok.
 1090: 
 1091: connect_nodes(A, B) ->
 1092:     %% Check that they haven't already connected.
 1093:     false = lists:member(A, rpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1094:     false = lists:member(B, rpc:call(A, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1095:     %% Connect them.
 1096:     pong = rpc:call(A, net_adm, ping, [B]).
 1097: 
 1098: 
 1099: test_nodes(V, H) ->
 1100:     %% No nodes should be visible on hidden_node
 1101:     [] = rpc:call(H, erlang, nodes, []),
 1102:     %% visible_node should be hidden on hidden_node
 1103:     true = lists:member(V, rpc:call(H, erlang, nodes, [hidden])),
 1104:     %% hidden_node node shouldn't be visible on visible_node
 1105:     false = lists:member(H, rpc:call(V, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1106:     %% hidden_node should be hidden on visible_node
 1107:     true = lists:member(H, rpc:call(V, erlang, nodes, [hidden])).
 1108: 
 1109: mn_loop(MNs) ->
 1110:     receive
 1111: 	{nodeup, N} ->
 1112: 	    mn_loop([{nodeup, N}|MNs]);
 1113: 	{nodedown, N} ->
 1114: 	    mn_loop([{nodedown, N}|MNs]);
 1115: 	{monitor_nodes_result, Ref, From} ->
 1116: 	    From ! {Ref, MNs};
 1117: 	_ ->
 1118: 	    mn_loop(MNs)
 1119:     end.
 1120: 
 1121: start_monitor_nodes_proc(Node) ->
 1122:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1123:     Starter = self(),
 1124:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 1125: 		fun() ->
 1126: 			net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1127: 			Starter ! Ref,
 1128: 			mn_loop([])
 1129: 		end),
 1130:     receive
 1131: 	Ref ->
 1132: 	    ok
 1133:     end,
 1134:     Pid.
 1135: 
 1136: 
 1137: check_monitor_nodes_res(Pid, Node) ->
 1138:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1139:     Pid ! {monitor_nodes_result, Ref, self()},
 1140:     receive
 1141: 	{Ref, MNs} ->
 1142: 	    false = lists:keysearch(Node, 2, MNs)
 1143:     end.
 1144: 
 1145: 
 1146: 
 1147: %% Check the kernel inet_dist_{listen,connect}_options options.
 1148: inet_dist_options_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1149:     Prio = 1,
 1150:     case gen_udp:open(0, [{priority,Prio}]) of
 1151: 	{ok,Socket} ->
 1152: 	    case inet:getopts(Socket, [priority]) of
 1153: 		{ok,[{priority,Prio}]} ->
 1154: 		    ok = gen_udp:close(Socket),
 1155: 		    do_inet_dist_options_options(Prio);
 1156: 		_ ->
 1157: 		    ok = gen_udp:close(Socket),
 1158: 		    {skip,
 1159: 		     "Can not set priority "++integer_to_list(Prio)++
 1160: 			 " on socket"}
 1161: 	    end;
 1162: 	{error,_} ->
 1163: 	    {skip, "Can not set priority on socket"}
 1164:     end.
 1165: 
 1166: do_inet_dist_options_options(Prio) ->
 1167:     PriorityString0 = "[{priority,"++integer_to_list(Prio)++"}]",
 1168:     PriorityString =
 1169: 	case os:cmd("echo [{a,1}]") of
 1170: 	    "[{a,1}]"++_ ->
 1171: 		PriorityString0;
 1172: 	    _ ->
 1173: 		%% Some shells need quoting of [{}]
 1174: 		"'"++PriorityString0++"'"
 1175: 	end,
 1176:     InetDistOptions =
 1177: 	"-hidden "
 1178: 	"-kernel inet_dist_connect_options "++PriorityString++" "
 1179: 	"-kernel inet_dist_listen_options "++PriorityString,
 1180:     {ok,Node1} =
 1181: 	start_node("", inet_dist_options_1, InetDistOptions),
 1182:     {ok,Node2} =
 1183: 	start_node("", inet_dist_options_2, InetDistOptions),
 1184:     %%
 1185:     pong =
 1186: 	rpc:call(Node1, net_adm, ping, [Node2]),
 1187:     PrioritiesNode1 =
 1188: 	rpc:call(Node1, ?MODULE, get_socket_priorities, []),
 1189:     PrioritiesNode2 =
 1190: 	rpc:call(Node2, ?MODULE, get_socket_priorities, []),
 1191:     io:format("PrioritiesNode1 = ~p", [PrioritiesNode1]),
 1192:     io:format("PrioritiesNode2 = ~p", [PrioritiesNode2]),
 1193:     Elevated = [P || P <- PrioritiesNode1, P =:= Prio],
 1194:     Elevated = [P || P <- PrioritiesNode2, P =:= Prio],
 1195:     [_|_] = Elevated,
 1196:     %%
 1197:     stop_node(Node2),
 1198:     stop_node(Node1),
 1199:     ok.
 1200: 
 1201: get_socket_priorities() ->
 1202:     [Priority ||
 1203: 	{ok,[{priority,Priority}]} <-
 1204: 	    [inet:getopts(Port, [priority]) ||
 1205: 		Port <- erlang:ports(),
 1206: 		element(2, erlang:port_info(Port, name)) =:= "tcp_inet"]].
 1207: 
 1208: 
 1209: 
 1210: %% check net_ticker_spawn_options
 1211: net_ticker_spawn_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1212:     run_dist_configs(fun net_ticker_spawn_options/2, Config).
 1213: 
 1214: net_ticker_spawn_options(DCfg, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1215:     FullsweepString0 = "[{fullsweep_after,0}]",
 1216:     FullsweepString =
 1217:         case os:cmd("echo [{a,1}]") of
 1218:             "[{a,1}]"++_ ->
 1219:                 FullsweepString0;
 1220:             _ ->
 1221:                 %% Some shells need quoting of [{}]
 1222:                 "'"++FullsweepString0++"'"
 1223:         end,
 1224:     InetDistOptions =
 1225:         "-hidden "
 1226:         "-kernel net_ticker_spawn_options "++FullsweepString,
 1227:     {ok,Node1} =
 1228:         start_node(DCfg, net_ticker_spawn_options_1, InetDistOptions),
 1229:     {ok,Node2} =
 1230:         start_node(DCfg, net_ticker_spawn_options_2, InetDistOptions),
 1231:     %%
 1232:     pong =
 1233:         erpc:call(Node1, net_adm, ping, [Node2]),
 1234:     FullsweepOptionNode1 =
 1235:         erpc:call(Node1, ?MODULE, get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option, [Node2]),
 1236:     FullsweepOptionNode2 =
 1237:         erpc:call(Node2, ?MODULE, get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option, [Node1]),
 1238:     io:format("FullsweepOptionNode1 = ~p", [FullsweepOptionNode1]),
 1239:     io:format("FullsweepOptionNode2 = ~p", [FullsweepOptionNode2]),
 1240:     0 = FullsweepOptionNode1,
 1241:     0 = FullsweepOptionNode2,
 1242:     %%
 1243:     stop_node(Node2),
 1244:     stop_node(Node1),
 1245:     ok.
 1246: 
 1247: get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option(Node) ->
 1248:     Links = case proplists:get_value(Node, erlang:system_info(dist_ctrl)) of
 1249:                 DistCtrl when is_port(DistCtrl) ->
 1250:                     {links, Ls} = erlang:port_info(DistCtrl, links),
 1251:                     Ls;
 1252:                 DistCtrl when is_pid(DistCtrl) ->
 1253:                     {links, Ls} = process_info(DistCtrl, links),
 1254:                     Ls
 1255:             end,
 1256:     Ticker = try
 1257:                  lists:foreach(
 1258:                    fun (Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 1259:                            {current_stacktrace, Stk}
 1260:                                = process_info(Pid, current_stacktrace),
 1261:                            lists:foreach(
 1262:                              fun ({dist_util, con_loop, _, _}) ->
 1263:                                      throw(Pid);
 1264:                                  (_) ->
 1265:                                      ok
 1266:                              end, Stk);
 1267:                        (_) ->
 1268:                            ok
 1269:                    end, Links),
 1270:                  error(no_ticker_found)
 1271:              catch
 1272:                  throw:Pid when is_pid(Pid) -> Pid
 1273:              end,
 1274:     {garbage_collection, GCOpts} = erlang:process_info(Ticker, garbage_collection),
 1275:     proplists:get_value(fullsweep_after, GCOpts).
 1276: 
 1277: 
 1278: 
 1279: %%
 1280: %% Testcase:
 1281: %%   monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason
 1282: %%
 1283: 
 1284: monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1285:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason/2, Config).
 1286: 
 1287: monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1288:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1289:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1290:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason]),
 1291: 
 1292:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(5, node),
 1293:     [NN1, NN2, NN3, NN4, NN5] = Names,
 1294: 
 1295:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1, "-connect_all false"),
 1296:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2, "-connect_all false"),
 1297:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3, "-connect_all false"),
 1298:     {ok, N4} = start_node(DCfg, NN4, "-hidden"),
 1299: 
 1300:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1301:     receive {nodeup, N2} -> ok end,
 1302:     receive {nodeup, N3} -> ok end,
 1303: 
 1304:     receive {nodeup, N1, []} -> ok end,
 1305:     receive {nodeup, N2, []} -> ok end,
 1306:     receive {nodeup, N3, []} -> ok end,
 1307: 
 1308:     stop_node(N1),
 1309:     stop_node(N4),
 1310:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(N2),
 1311:     TickTime = net_kernel:get_net_ticktime(),
 1312:     SleepTime = TickTime + (TickTime div 2),
 1313:     spawn(N3, fun () ->
 1314: 		      block_emu(SleepTime*1000),
 1315: 		      halt()
 1316: 	      end),
 1317: 
 1318:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1319:     receive {nodedown, N2} -> ok end,
 1320:     receive {nodedown, N3} -> ok end,
 1321: 
 1322:     receive {nodedown, N1, [{nodedown_reason, R1}]} -> connection_closed = R1 end,
 1323:     receive {nodedown, N2, [{nodedown_reason, R2}]} -> disconnect = R2 end,
 1324:     receive {nodedown, N3, [{nodedown_reason, R3}]} -> net_tick_timeout = R3 end,
 1325: 
 1326:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason]),
 1327: 
 1328:     {ok, N5} = start_node(DCfg, NN5),
 1329:     stop_node(N5),
 1330: 
 1331:     receive {nodeup, N5} -> ok end,
 1332:     receive {nodedown, N5} -> ok end,
 1333:     print_my_messages(),
 1334:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1335:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1336:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1337:     ok.
 1338: 
 1339: 
 1340: monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1341:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason/2, Config).
 1342: 
 1343: monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1344:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1345:     Me = self(),
 1346:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason]),
 1347:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason),
 1348:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name, ""),
 1349:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 1350: 		fun() ->
 1351: 			Me ! {stuff,
 1352: 			      self(),
 1353: 			      [make_ref(),
 1354: 			       {processes(), erlang:ports()}]}
 1355: 		end),
 1356:     receive {nodeup, Node, []} -> ok end,
 1357:     {ok, NodeInfo} = net_kernel:node_info(Node),
 1358:     {value,{owner, Owner}} = lists:keysearch(owner, 1, NodeInfo),
 1359:     ComplexTerm = receive {stuff, Pid, _} = Msg ->
 1360: 			  {Msg, term_to_binary(Msg)}
 1361: 		  end,
 1362:     exit(Owner, ComplexTerm),
 1363:     receive
 1364: 	{nodedown, Node, [{nodedown_reason, NodeDownReason}]} ->
 1365: 	    ok
 1366:     end,
 1367:     %% If the complex nodedown_reason messed something up garbage collections
 1368:     %% are likely to dump core
 1369:     garbage_collect(),
 1370:     garbage_collect(),
 1371:     garbage_collect(),
 1372:     ComplexTerm = NodeDownReason,
 1373:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason]),
 1374:     no_msgs(),
 1375:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1376:     ok.
 1377: 
 1378: 
 1379:

 1381: %%
 1382: %% Testcase:
 1383: %%   monitor_nodes_node_type
 1384: %%
 1385: 
 1386: monitor_nodes_node_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1387:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_node_type/2, Config).
 1388: 
 1389: monitor_nodes_node_type(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1390:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1391:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1392:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, all}]),
 1393:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(9, node),
 1394:     [NN1, NN2, NN3, NN4, NN5, NN6, NN7, NN8, NN9] = Names,
 1395: 
 1396:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1),
 1397:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2),
 1398:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3, "-hidden"),
 1399:     {ok, N4} = start_node(DCfg, NN4, "-hidden"),
 1400: 
 1401:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1402:     receive {nodeup, N2} -> ok end,
 1403: 
 1404:     receive {nodeup, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1405:     receive {nodeup, N2, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1406:     receive {nodeup, N3, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1407:     receive {nodeup, N4, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1408: 
 1409:     stop_node(N1),
 1410:     stop_node(N2),
 1411:     stop_node(N3),
 1412:     stop_node(N4),
 1413: 
 1414:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1415:     receive {nodedown, N2} -> ok end,
 1416: 
 1417:     receive {nodedown, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1418:     receive {nodedown, N2, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1419:     receive {nodedown, N3, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1420:     receive {nodedown, N4, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1421: 
 1422:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, all}]),
 1423:     {ok, N5} = start_node(DCfg, NN5),
 1424: 
 1425:     receive {nodeup, N5} -> ok end,
 1426:     stop_node(N5),
 1427:     receive {nodedown, N5} -> ok end,
 1428: 
 1429:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1430:     {ok, N6} = start_node(DCfg, NN6),
 1431:     {ok, N7} = start_node(DCfg, NN7, "-hidden"),
 1432: 
 1433: 
 1434:     receive {nodeup, N6} -> ok end,
 1435:     receive {nodeup, N7, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1436:     stop_node(N6),
 1437:     stop_node(N7),
 1438: 
 1439:     receive {nodedown, N6} -> ok end,
 1440:     receive {nodedown, N7, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1441: 
 1442:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, visible}]),
 1443:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1444:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1445: 
 1446:     {ok, N8} = start_node(DCfg, NN8),
 1447:     {ok, N9} = start_node(DCfg, NN9, "-hidden"),
 1448: 
 1449:     receive {nodeup, N8, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1450:     stop_node(N8),
 1451:     stop_node(N9),
 1452: 
 1453:     receive {nodedown, N8, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1454:     print_my_messages(),
 1455:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1456:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, visible}]),
 1457:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1458:     ok.
 1459:
