 1461: %%
 1462: %% Testcase:
 1463: %%   monitor_nodes
 1464: %%
 1465: 
 1466: monitor_nodes_misc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1467:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_misc/2, Config).
 1468: 
 1469: monitor_nodes_misc(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1470:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1471:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1472:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, all}, nodedown_reason]),
 1473:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason, {node_type, all}, connection_id]),
 1474:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true}),
 1475:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true, connection_id => true}),
 1476:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(3, node),
 1477:     [NN1, NN2, NN3] = Names,
 1478: 
 1479:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1),
 1480:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2, "-hidden"),
 1481: 
 1482:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1483: 
 1484:     receive {nodeup, N1, #{node_type := visible}} -> ok end,
 1485:     receive {nodeup, N2, #{node_type := hidden}} -> ok end,
 1486:     receive {nodeup, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1487:     receive {nodeup, N2, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1488: 
 1489:     NodesInfo = erlang:nodes(connected, #{connection_id => true}),
 1490: 
 1491:     {N1, #{connection_id := N1CId}} = lists:keyfind(N1, 1, NodesInfo),
 1492:     {N2, #{connection_id := N2CId}} = lists:keyfind(N2, 1, NodesInfo),
 1493: 
 1494:     ct:pal("N1: ~p ~p~n", [N1, N1CId]),
 1495:     ct:pal("N2: ~p ~p~n", [N2, N2CId]),
 1496: 
 1497:     receive {nodeup, N1, #{node_type := visible, connection_id := N1CId}} -> ok end,
 1498:     receive {nodeup, N2, #{node_type := hidden, connection_id := N2CId}} -> ok end,
 1499: 
 1500:     N1UpInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},{connection_id, N1CId}]),
 1501:     N2UpInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},{connection_id, N2CId}]),
 1502: 
 1503:     receive {nodeup, N1, UpN1Info} -> N1UpInfoSorted = lists:sort(UpN1Info) end,
 1504:     receive {nodeup, N2, UpN2Info} -> N2UpInfoSorted = lists:sort(UpN2Info) end,
 1505: 
 1506:     stop_node(N1),
 1507:     stop_node(N2),
 1508: 
 1509:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1510: 
 1511:     receive {nodedown, N1, #{node_type := visible,
 1512:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed}} -> ok end,
 1513:     receive {nodedown, N1, #{node_type := visible,
 1514:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed,
 1515:                              connection_id := N1CId}} -> ok end,
 1516:     receive {nodedown, N2, #{node_type := hidden,
 1517:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed}} -> ok end,
 1518:     receive {nodedown, N2, #{node_type := hidden,
 1519:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed,
 1520:                              connection_id := N2CId}} -> ok end,
 1521: 
 1522:     N1ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},
 1523:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed}]),
 1524:     N1BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},
 1525:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed},
 1526:                                     {connection_id, N1CId}]),
 1527:     N2ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},
 1528:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed}]),
 1529:     N2BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},
 1530:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed},
 1531:                                     {connection_id, N2CId}]),
 1532: 
 1533:     receive
 1534:         {nodedown, N1, N1Info1} ->
 1535:             case lists:sort(N1Info1) of
 1536:                 N1ADownInfoSorted ->
 1537:                     receive
 1538:                         {nodedown, N1, N1Info2} ->
 1539:                             N1BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N1Info2)
 1540:                     end;
 1541:                 N1BDownInfoSorted ->
 1542:                     receive
 1543:                         {nodedown, N1, N1Info2} ->
 1544:                             N1ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N1Info2)
 1545:                     end
 1546:             end
 1547:     end,
 1548:     receive
 1549:         {nodedown, N2, N2Info1} ->
 1550:             case lists:sort(N2Info1) of
 1551:                 N2ADownInfoSorted ->
 1552:                     receive
 1553:                         {nodedown, N2, N2Info2} ->
 1554:                             N2BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N2Info2)
 1555:                     end;
 1556:                 N2BDownInfoSorted ->
 1557:                     receive
 1558:                         {nodedown, N2, N2Info2} ->
 1559:                             N2ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N2Info2)
 1560:                     end
 1561:             end
 1562:     end,
 1563: 
 1564:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, all}, nodedown_reason]),
 1565:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason, {node_type, all}, connection_id]),
 1566:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true}),
 1567:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true, connection_id => true}),
 1568: 
 1569:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3),
 1570:     receive {nodeup, N3} -> ok end,
 1571:     stop_node(N3),
 1572:     receive {nodedown, N3} -> ok end,
 1573:     print_my_messages(),
 1574:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1575:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1576:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1577:     ok.
 1578: 
 1579: 
 1580: %% Tests that {nodeup, Node} messages are received before
 1581: %% messages from Node and that {nodedown, Node} messages are
 1582: %% received after messages from Node.
 1583: monitor_nodes_otp_6481(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1584:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_otp_6481/2, Config).
 1585: 
 1586: monitor_nodes_otp_6481(DCfg, Config) ->
 1587:     io:format("Testing nodedown...~n"),
 1588:     monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, nodedown),
 1589:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1590:     io:format("Testing nodeup...~n"),
 1591:     monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, nodeup),
 1592:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1593:     ok.
 1594: 
 1595: monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, TestType) when is_list(Config) ->
 1596:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1597:     NodeMsg = make_ref(),
 1598:     Me = self(),
 1599:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_otp_6481),
 1600:     case TestType of
 1601: 	nodedown -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true);
 1602: 	nodeup -> ok
 1603:     end,
 1604:     Seq = lists:seq(1,10000),
 1605:     MN = spawn_link(
 1606: 	   fun () ->
 1607: 		   lists:foreach(
 1608: 		     fun (_) ->
 1609: 			     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true)
 1610: 		     end,
 1611: 		     Seq),
 1612: 		   Me ! {mon_set, self()},
 1613: 		   receive after infinity -> ok end
 1614: 	   end),
 1615:     receive {mon_set, MN} -> ok end,
 1616:     case TestType of
 1617: 	nodedown -> ok;
 1618: 	nodeup -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true)
 1619:     end,
 1620: 
 1621:     %% Whitebox:
 1622:     %% nodedown test: Since this process was the first one monitoring
 1623:     %%                nodes this process will be the first one notified
 1624:     %%                on nodedown.
 1625:     %% nodeup test:   Since this process was the last one monitoring
 1626:     %%                nodes this process will be the last one notified
 1627:     %%                on nodeup
 1628: 
 1629:     %% Verify the monitor_nodes order expected
 1630:     TestMonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1631:     %% io:format("~p~n", [TestMonNodeState]),
 1632:     TestMonNodeState =
 1633: 	case TestType of
 1634: 	    nodedown -> [];
 1635: 	    nodeup -> [{self(), []}]
 1636: 	end
 1637: 	++ lists:map(fun (_) -> {MN, []} end, Seq)
 1638: 	++ case TestType of
 1639: 	       nodedown -> [{self(), []}];
 1640: 	       nodeup -> []
 1641: 	   end
 1642: 	++ MonNodeState,
 1643: 
 1644:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name, "", this),
 1645:     receive {nodeup, Node} -> ok end,
 1646: 
 1647:     RemotePid = spawn(Node,
 1648: 		      fun () ->
 1649: 			      receive after 1500 -> ok end,
 1650: 			      %% infinite loop of msgs
 1651: 			      %% we want an endless stream of messages and the kill
 1652: 			      %% the node mercilessly.
 1653: 			      %% We then want to ensure that the nodedown message arrives
 1654: 			      %% last ... without garbage after it.
 1655: 			      _ = spawn(fun() -> node_loop_send(Me, NodeMsg, 1) end),
 1656: 			      receive {Me, kill_it} -> ok end,
 1657: 			      halt()
 1658: 		      end),
 1659: 
 1660:     net_kernel:disconnect(Node),
 1661:     receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end,
 1662: 
 1663:     %% Verify that '{nodeup, Node}' comes before '{NodeMsg, 1}' (the message
 1664:     %% bringing up the connection).
 1665:     {nodeup, Node} = receive Msg1 -> Msg1 end,
 1666:     {NodeMsg, N}   = receive Msg2 -> Msg2 end,
 1667:     %% msg stream has begun, kill the node
 1668:     RemotePid ! {self(), kill_it},
 1669: 
 1670:     %% Verify that '{nodedown, Node}' comes after the last '{NodeMsg, N}'
 1671:     %% message.
 1672:     {nodedown, Node} = flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, N+1),
 1673:     no_msgs(500),
 1674: 
 1675:     Mon = erlang:monitor(process, MN),
 1676:     unlink(MN),
 1677:     exit(MN, bang),
 1678:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, MN, bang} -> ok end,
 1679:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1680:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1681:     ok.
 1682: 
 1683: flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, No) ->
 1684:     case receive Msg -> Msg end of
 1685: 	{NodeMsg, N} when N >= No ->
 1686: 	    flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, N+1);
 1687: 	OtherMsg ->
 1688: 	    OtherMsg
 1689:     end.
 1690: 
 1691: node_loop_send(Pid, Msg, No) ->
 1692:     Pid ! {Msg, No},
 1693:     node_loop_send(Pid, Msg, No + 1).
 1694: 
 1695: monitor_nodes_errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1696:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1697:     error = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(asdf),
 1698:     {error,
 1699:      {unknown_options,
 1700:       [gurka]}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1701: 					   [gurka]),
 1702:     {error,
 1703:      {unknown_options,
 1704:       #{gurka := true}}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1705:                                                     #{gurka => true}),
 1706:     {error,
 1707:      {invalid_options,
 1708:       gurka}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1709: 					 gurka),
 1710:     {error,
 1711:      {option_value_mismatch,
 1712:       [{node_type,visible},
 1713:        {node_type,hidden}]}}
 1714: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1715: 				   [{node_type,hidden},
 1716: 				    {node_type,visible}]),
 1717:     {error,
 1718:      {option_value_mismatch,
 1719:       [{node_type,visible},
 1720:        {node_type,all}]}}
 1721: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1722: 				   [{node_type,all},
 1723: 				    {node_type,visible}]),
 1724:     {error,
 1725:      {bad_option_value,
 1726:       {node_type,
 1727:        blaha}}}
 1728: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, blaha}]),
 1729:     {error,
 1730:      {bad_option_value,
 1731:       #{node_type := blaha}}}
 1732: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => blaha}),
 1733:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1734:     ok.
 1735: 
 1736: monitor_nodes_combinations(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1737:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_combinations/2, Config).
 1738: 
 1739: monitor_nodes_combinations(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1740:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1741:     monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1742:     [VisibleName, HiddenName] = get_nodenames(2,
 1743: 					      monitor_nodes_combinations),
 1744:     {ok, Visible} = start_node(DCfg, VisibleName, ""),
 1745:     receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(visible, Visible),
 1746:     no_msgs(),
 1747:     stop_node(Visible),
 1748:     receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(visible, Visible, connection_closed),
 1749:     no_msgs(),
 1750:     {ok, Hidden} = start_node(DCfg, HiddenName, "-hidden"),
 1751:     receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(hidden, Hidden),
 1752:     no_msgs(),
 1753:     stop_node(Hidden),
 1754:     receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(hidden, Hidden, connection_closed),
 1755:     no_msgs(),
 1756:     monitor_nodes_all_comb(false),
 1757:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1758:     no_msgs(),
 1759:     ok.
 1760: 
 1761: monitor_nodes_all_comb(Flag) ->
 1762:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag),
 1763:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1764: 				  [nodedown_reason]),
 1765:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1766: 				  [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1767:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1768: 				  [{node_type, visible}]),
 1769:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1770: 				  [{node_type, all}]),
 1771:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1772: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1773: 				   {node_type, hidden}]),
 1774:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1775: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1776: 				   {node_type, visible}]),
 1777:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1778: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1779: 				   {node_type, all}]),
 1780:     %% There currently are 8 different combinations
 1781:     8.
 1782: 
 1783: 
 1784: receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(visible, Node) ->
 1785:     io:format("Receive nodeup visible...~n"),
 1786:     Exp = [{nodeup, Node},
 1787: 	   {nodeup, Node, []}]
 1788: 	++ mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(visible, Node),
 1789:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1790:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1791:     ok;
 1792: receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(hidden, Node) ->
 1793:     io:format("Receive nodeup hidden...~n"),
 1794:     Exp = mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(hidden, Node),
 1795:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1796:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1797:     ok.
 1798: 
 1799: mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(Type, Node) ->
 1800:     InfoNt = [{node_type, Type}],
 1801:     [{nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1802:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1803:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1804:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt}].
 1805: 
 1806: receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(visible, Node, Reason) ->
 1807:     io:format("Receive nodedown visible...~n"),
 1808:     Exp = [{nodedown, Node},
 1809: 	   {nodedown, Node, [{nodedown_reason, Reason}]}]
 1810: 	++ mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(visible,
 1811: 						   Node,
 1812: 						   Reason),
 1813:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1814:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1815:     ok;
 1816: receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(hidden, Node, Reason) ->
 1817:     io:format("Receive nodedown hidden...~n"),
 1818:     Exp = mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(hidden, Node, Reason),
 1819:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1820:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1821:     ok.
 1822: 
 1823: mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(Type, Node, Reason) ->
 1824:     InfoNt = [{node_type, Type}],
 1825:     InfoNdrNt = lists:sort([{nodedown_reason, Reason}]++InfoNt),
 1826:     [{nodedown, Node, InfoNt},
 1827:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNt},
 1828:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNdrNt},
 1829:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNdrNt}].
 1830: 
 1831: receive_mn_msgs([]) ->
 1832:     ok;
 1833: receive_mn_msgs(Msgs) ->
 1834:     io:format("Expecting msgs: ~p~n", [Msgs]),
 1835:     receive
 1836: 	{_Dir, _Node} = Msg ->
 1837: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1838: 	    case lists:member(Msg, Msgs) of
 1839: 		true -> receive_mn_msgs(lists:delete(Msg, Msgs));
 1840: 		false -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1841: 				  expected_messages, Msgs})
 1842: 	    end;
 1843: 	{Dir, Node, Info} ->
 1844: 	    Msg = {Dir, Node, lists:sort(Info)},
 1845: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1846: 	    case lists:member(Msg, Msgs) of
 1847: 		true -> receive_mn_msgs(lists:delete(Msg, Msgs));
 1848: 		false -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1849: 				  expected_messages, Msgs})
 1850: 	    end;
 1851: 	Msg ->
 1852: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1853: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1854: 		     expected_messages, Msgs})
 1855:     end.
 1856: 
 1857: monitor_nodes_cleanup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1858:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1859:     Me = self(),
 1860:     No = monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1861:     Inf = spawn(fun () ->
 1862: 			monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1863: 			Me ! {mons_set, self()},
 1864: 			receive after infinity -> ok end
 1865: 		end),
 1866:     TO = spawn(fun () ->
 1867: 		       monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1868: 		       Me ! {mons_set, self()},
 1869: 		       receive after 500 -> ok end
 1870: 	       end),
 1871:     receive {mons_set, Inf} -> ok end,
 1872:     receive {mons_set, TO} -> ok end,
 1873:     MNLen = length(MonNodeState) + No*3,
 1874:     MNLen = length(monitor_node_state()),
 1875:     MonInf = erlang:monitor(process, Inf),
 1876:     MonTO = erlang:monitor(process, TO),
 1877:     exit(Inf, bang),
 1878:     No = monitor_nodes_all_comb(false),
 1879:     receive {'DOWN', MonInf, process, Inf, bang} -> ok end,
 1880:     receive {'DOWN', MonTO, process, TO, normal} -> ok end,
 1881:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1882:     no_msgs(),
 1883:     ok.
 1884: 
 1885: monitor_nodes_many(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1886:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_many/2, Config).
 1887: 
 1888: monitor_nodes_many(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1889:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1890:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_many),
 1891:     %% We want to perform more than 2^16 net_kernel:monitor_nodes
 1892:     %% since this will wrap an internal counter
 1893:     No = (1 bsl 16) + 17,
 1894:     repeat(fun () -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true) end, No),
 1895:     No = length(monitor_node_state()) - length(MonNodeState),
 1896:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name),
 1897:     repeat(fun () -> receive {nodeup, Node} -> ok end end, No),
 1898:     stop_node(Node),
 1899:     repeat(fun () -> receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end end, No),
 1900:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1901:     no_msgs(10),
 1902:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1903:     ok.
 1904: 
 1905: %% Test order of messages nodedown and nodeup.
 1906: monitor_nodes_down_up(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1907:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1908:     true = net_kernel:connect_node(Node),
 1909:     monitor_nodes_yoyo(Node),
 1910:     peer:stop(Peer).
 1911: 
 1912: monitor_nodes_yoyo(A) ->
 1913:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1914:     Papa = self(),
 1915: 
 1916:     %% Spawn lots of processes doing one erlang:monitor_node(A,true) each
 1917:     %% just to get lots of other monitors to fire when connection goes down
 1918:     %% and thereby give time for {nodeup,A} to race before {nodedown,A}.
 1919:     NodeMonCnt = 10000,
 1920:     NodeMons = [my_spawn_opt(fun F() ->
 1921:                                      monitor_node = receive_any(),
 1922:                                      monitor_node(A, true),
 1923:                                      Papa ! ready,
 1924:                                      {nodedown, A} =  receive_any(),
 1925:                                      F()
 1926:                              end,
 1927:                              [link, monitor, {priority, low}])
 1928:                 ||
 1929:                    _ <- lists:seq(1, NodeMonCnt)],
 1930: 
 1931:     %% Spawn message spamming process to trigger new connection setups
 1932:     %% as quick as possible.
 1933:     Spammer = my_spawn_opt(fun F() ->
 1934:                                    {dummy, A} ! trigger_auto_connect,
 1935:                                    F()
 1936:                            end,
 1937:                            [link, monitor]),
 1938: 
 1939:     %% Now bring connection down and verify we get {nodedown,A} before {nodeup,A}.
 1940:     Yoyos = 20,
 1941:     [begin
 1942:          [P ! monitor_node || P <- NodeMons],
 1943:          [receive ready -> ok end || _ <- NodeMons],
 1944: 
 1945:          Owner = get_conn_owner(A),
 1946:          exit(Owner, kill),
 1947: 
 1948:          {nodedown, A} = receive_any(),
 1949:          {nodeup, A} = receive_any()
 1950:      end
 1951:      || _ <- lists:seq(1,Yoyos)],
 1952: 
 1953:     unlink(Spammer),
 1954:     exit(Spammer, die),
 1955:     receive {'DOWN',_,process,Spammer,_} -> ok end,
 1956: 
 1957:     [begin unlink(P), exit(P, die) end || P <- NodeMons],
 1958:     [receive {'DOWN',_,process,P,_} -> ok end || P <- NodeMons],
 1959: 
 1960:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1961:     ok.
 1962: 
 1963: receive_any() ->
 1964:     receive_any(infinity).
 1965: 
 1966: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1967:     receive
 1968:         M -> M
 1969:     after
 1970:         Timeout -> timeout
 1971:     end.
 1972: 
 1973: my_spawn_opt(Fun, Opts) ->
 1974:     case spawn_opt(Fun, Opts) of
 1975:         {Pid, _Mref} -> Pid;
 1976:         Pid -> Pid
 1977:     end.
 1978: 
 1979: get_conn_owner(Node) ->
 1980:     {ok, NodeInfo} = net_kernel:node_info(Node),
 1981:     {value,{owner, Owner}} = lists:keysearch(owner, 1, NodeInfo),
 1982:     Owner.
 1983: 
 1984: dist_ctrl_proc_smoke(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1985:     dist_ctrl_proc_test(get_nodenames(2, ?FUNCTION_NAME)).
 1986: 
 1987: dist_ctrl_proc_reject(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1988:     ToReject = combinations(dist_util:rejectable_flags()),
 1989:     lists:map(fun(Flags) ->
 1990:                       ct:log("Try to reject ~p",[Flags]),
 1991:                       dist_ctrl_proc_test(get_nodenames(2, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1992:                         "-gen_tcp_dist_reject_flags " ++ integer_to_list(Flags))
 1993:               end, ToReject).
 1994: 
 1995: combinations([H | T]) ->
 1996:     lists:flatten([[(1 bsl H) bor C || C <- combinations(T)] | combinations(T)]);
 1997: combinations([]) ->
 1998:     [0];
 1999: combinations(BitField) ->
 2000:     lists:sort(combinations(bits(BitField, 0))).
 2001: 
 2002: bits(0, _) ->
 2003:     [];
 2004: bits(BitField, Cnt) when BitField band 1 == 1 ->
 2005:     [Cnt | bits(BitField bsr 1, Cnt + 1)];
 2006: bits(BitField, Cnt) ->
 2007:     bits(BitField bsr 1, Cnt + 1).
 2008: 
 2009: dist_ctrl_proc_test(Nodes) ->
 2010:     dist_ctrl_proc_test(Nodes,"").
 2011: 
 2012: dist_ctrl_proc_test([Name1,Name2], Extra) ->
 2013:     ThisNode = node(),
 2014:     GenTcpOptProlog = "-proto_dist gen_tcp "
 2015:         "-gen_tcp_dist_output_loop " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " " ++
 2016:         "dist_cntrlr_output_test_size " ++ Extra,
 2017:     {ok, Node1} = start_node("", Name1, "-proto_dist gen_tcp"),
 2018:     {ok, Node2} = start_node("", Name2, GenTcpOptProlog),
 2019:     NL = lists:sort([ThisNode, Node1, Node2]),
 2020:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2021:                        NL == lists:sort([node()|nodes()])
 2022:                end),
 2023:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2024:                        NL == lists:sort([rpc:call(Node1,erlang, node, [])
 2025:                                          | rpc:call(Node1, erlang, nodes, [])])
 2026:                end),
 2027:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2028:                        NL == lists:sort([rpc:call(Node2,erlang, node, [])
 2029:                                          | rpc:call(Node2, erlang, nodes, [])])
 2030:                end),
 2031: 
 2032:     smoke_communicate(Node1, gen_tcp_dist, dist_cntrlr_output_loop),
 2033:     smoke_communicate(Node2, erl_distribution_SUITE, dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size),
 2034: 
 2035:     stop_node(Node1),
 2036:     stop_node(Node2),
 2037:     ok.
 2038: 
 2039: smoke_communicate(Node, OLoopMod, OLoopFun) ->
 2040:     %% Verify that we actually are executing the distribution
 2041:     %% module we expect and also massage message passing over
 2042:     %% the connection a bit...
 2043:     Ps = rpc:call(Node, erlang, processes, []),
 2044:     try
 2045:         lists:foreach(
 2046:           fun (P) ->
 2047:                   case rpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P, current_stacktrace]) of
 2048:                       undefined ->
 2049:                           ok;
 2050:                       {current_stacktrace, StkTrace} ->
 2051:                           lists:foreach(fun ({Mod, Fun, 2, _}) when Mod == OLoopMod,
 2052:                                                                     Fun == OLoopFun ->
 2053:                                                 io:format("~p ~p~n", [P, StkTrace]),
 2054:                                                 throw(found_it);
 2055:                                             (_) ->
 2056:                                                 ok
 2057:                                         end, StkTrace)
 2058:                   end
 2059:           end, Ps),
 2060:         exit({missing, {OLoopMod, OLoopFun}})
 2061:     catch
 2062:         throw:found_it -> ok
 2063:     end,
 2064:     Bin = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1000,100)),
 2065:     BitStr = <<0:7999>>,
 2066:     List = [[Bin], atom, [BitStr|Bin], make_ref(), [[[BitStr|"hopp"]]],
 2067:             4711, 111122222211111111111111,"hej", fun () -> ok end, BitStr,
 2068:             self(), fun erlang:node/1],
 2069:     Pid = spawn_link(Node, fun () -> receive {From1, Msg1} -> From1 ! Msg1 end,
 2070:                                      receive {From2, Msg2} -> From2 ! Msg2 end
 2071:                            end),
 2072:     R = make_ref(),
 2073:     Pid ! {self(), [R, List]},
 2074:     receive [R, L1] -> List = L1 end,
 2075: 
 2076:     %% Send a huge message in order to trigger message fragmentation if enabled
 2077:     FragBin = <<0:(2*(1024*64*8))>>,
 2078:     Pid ! {self(), [R, List, FragBin]},
 2079:     receive [R, L2, B] -> List = L2, FragBin = B end,
 2080: 
 2081:     unlink(Pid),
 2082:     exit(Pid, kill),
 2083:     ok.
 2084: 
 2085: 
 2086: erl_uds_dist_smoke_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2087:     case os:type() of
 2088:         {win32,_} ->
 2089:             {skipped, "Not on Windows"};
 2090:         _ ->
 2091:             do_erl_uds_dist_smoke_test()
 2092:     end.
 2093: 
 2094: do_erl_uds_dist_smoke_test() ->
 2095:     [Node1, Node2] = lists:map(fun (Name) ->
 2096:                                        list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@localhost")
 2097:                                end,
 2098:                                get_nodenames(2, erl_uds_dist_smoke_test)),
 2099:     {LPort, Acceptor} = uds_listen(),
 2100:     start_uds_node(Node1, LPort),
 2101:     start_uds_node(Node2, LPort),
 2102:     receive
 2103:         {uds_nodeup, N1} ->
 2104:             io:format("~p is up~n", [N1])
 2105:     end,
 2106:     receive
 2107:         {uds_nodeup, N2} ->
 2108:             io:format("~p is up~n", [N2])
 2109:     end,
 2110:     
 2111:     io:format("Testing ping net_adm:ping(~p) on ~p~n", [Node2, Node1]),
 2112:     Node1 ! {self(), {net_adm, ping, [Node2]}},
 2113:     receive
 2114:         {Node1, PingRes} ->
 2115:             io:format("~p~n", [PingRes]),
 2116:             pong = PingRes
 2117:     end,
 2118: 
 2119:     io:format("Testing nodes() on ~p~n", [Node1]),
 2120:     Node1 ! {self(), {erlang, nodes, []}},
 2121:     receive
 2122:         {Node1, N1List} ->
 2123:             io:format("~p~n", [N1List]),
 2124:             [Node2] = N1List
 2125:     end,
 2126: 
 2127:     io:format("Testing nodes() on ~p~n", [Node2]),
 2128:     Node2 ! {self(), {erlang, nodes, []}},
 2129:     receive
 2130:         {Node2, N2List} ->
 2131:             io:format("~p~n", [N2List]),
 2132:             [Node1] = N2List
 2133:     end,
 2134: 
 2135:     io:format("Shutting down~n", []),
 2136: 
 2137:     Node1 ! {self(), close},
 2138:     Node2 ! {self(), close},
 2139: 
 2140:     receive {Node1, C1} -> ok = C1 end,
 2141:     receive {Node2, C2} -> ok = C2 end,
 2142: 
 2143:     unlink(Acceptor),
 2144:     exit(Acceptor, kill),
 2145: 
 2146:     io:format("ok~n", []),
 2147: 
 2148:     ok.
 2149: 
 2150: %% Helpers for testing the erl_uds_dist example
 2151: 
 2152: uds_listen() ->
 2153:     Me = self(),
 2154:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, {packet, 4}, {active, false}]),
 2155:     {ok, LPort} = inet:port(LSock),
 2156:     {LPort, spawn_link(fun () ->
 2157:                                uds_accept_loop(LSock, Me)
 2158:                        end)}.
 2159: 
 2160: uds_accept_loop(LSock, TestProc) ->
 2161:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 2162:     _ = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2163:                            uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc)
 2164:                    end),
 2165:     uds_accept_loop(LSock, TestProc).
 2166: 
 2167: uds_rpc(Sock, MFA) ->
 2168:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(MFA)),
 2169:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
 2170:         {error, Reason} ->
 2171:             error({recv_failed, Reason});
 2172:         {ok, Packet} ->
 2173:             binary_to_term(Packet)
 2174:     end.
 2175: 
 2176: uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc) ->
 2177:     case uds_rpc(Sock, {erlang, node, []}) of
 2178:         nonode@nohost ->
 2179:             %% Wait for distribution to come up...
 2180:             receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2181:             uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc);
 2182:         Node when is_atom(Node) ->
 2183:             register(Node, self()),
 2184:             TestProc ! {uds_nodeup, Node},
 2185:             uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node)
 2186:     end.
 2187: 
 2188: uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node) ->
 2189:     receive
 2190:         {From, close} ->
 2191:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(close)),
 2192:             From ! {Node, gen_tcp:close(Sock)},
 2193:             exit(normal);
 2194:         {From, ApplyData} ->
 2195:             From ! {Node, uds_rpc(Sock, ApplyData)},
 2196:             uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node)
 2197:     end.
 2198: 
 2199: uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock) ->
 2200:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
 2201:         {error, Reason} ->
 2202:             error({recv_failed, Reason});
 2203:         {ok, Packet} ->
 2204:             case binary_to_term(Packet) of
 2205:                 {M, F, A} when is_atom(M), is_atom(F), is_list(A) ->
 2206:                     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(apply(M, F, A)));
 2207:                 {F, A} when is_function(F), is_list(A) ->
 2208:                     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(apply(F, A)));
 2209:                 close ->
 2210:                     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 2211:                     exit(normal);
 2212:                 Other ->
 2213:                     error({unexpected_data, Other})
 2214:             end
 2215:     end,
 2216:     uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock).
 2217: 
 2218: start_uds_rpc_server([PortString]) ->
 2219:     Port = list_to_integer(PortString),
 2220:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 2221:                                        {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect({127,0,0,1}, Port,
 2222:                                                                     [binary, {packet, 4},
 2223:                                                                      {active, false}]),
 2224:                                        uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock)
 2225:                                end),
 2226:     receive
 2227:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 2228:             if Reason == normal ->
 2229:                     halt();
 2230:                true ->
 2231:                     EStr = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("uds rpc server crashed: ~p", [Reason])),
 2232:                     (catch file:write_file("uds_rpc_server_crash."++os:getpid(), EStr)),
 2233:                     halt(EStr)
 2234:             end
 2235:     end.
 2236: 
 2237: start_uds_node(NodeName, LPort) ->
 2238:     Static = "-detached -noinput -proto_dist erl_uds",
 2239:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2240:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
 2241: 	       {ok,[[P]]} -> P;
 2242: 	       _ -> error(no_progname_argument_found)
 2243: 	   end,
 2244:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2245:     NameStr = atom_to_list(NodeName),
 2246:     CmdLine = Prog ++ " "
 2247: 	++ Static
 2248: 	++ " -sname " ++ NameStr
 2249: 	++ " -pa " ++ Pa
 2250: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
 2251: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 2252:         ++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " start_uds_rpc_server "
 2253:         ++ integer_to_list(LPort),
 2254:     io:format("Starting: ~p~n", [CmdLine]),
 2255:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, []) of
 2256: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 2257: 	    unlink(Port),
 2258: 	    erlang:port_close(Port);
 2259: 	Error ->
 2260: 	    error({open_port_failed, Error})
 2261:     end,
 2262:     ok.
 2263: 
 2264: erl_1424(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2265:     {error, Reason} = erl_epmd:names("."),
 2266:     {comment, lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Reason: ~p", [Reason]))}.
 2267: 
 2268: net_kernel_start(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2269:     MyName = net_kernel_start_tester,
 2270:     register(MyName, self()),
 2271:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, true, false),
 2272:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, false, false),
 2273:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, true, true),
 2274:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, undefined, undefined, undefined, undefined).
 2275: 
 2276: net_kernel_start_test(MyName, NetTickTime, NetTickIntesity, DistListen, Hidden) ->
 2277:     TestNameStr = "net_kernel_start_test_node-"
 2278:         ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(seconds))
 2279:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([monotonic,positive])),
 2280:     TestNode = list_to_atom(TestNameStr ++ "@" ++ atom_to_list(gethostname())),
 2281:     CmdLine = net_kernel_start_cmdline(MyName, list_to_atom(TestNameStr),
 2282:                                        NetTickTime, NetTickIntesity, DistListen, Hidden),
 2283:     io:format("Starting test node ~p: ~s~n", [TestNode, CmdLine]),
 2284:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, []) of
 2285: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 2286:             case DistListen == false of
 2287:                 false ->
 2288:                     ok;
 2289:                 true ->
 2290:                     receive after 1500 -> ok end,
 2291:                     pang = net_adm:ping(TestNode),
 2292:                     ok
 2293:             end,
 2294:             receive
 2295:                 {i_am_alive, Pid, Node, NTT} = Msg ->
 2296:                     IsHidden = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(hidden)),
 2297:                     IsVisible = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(visible)),
 2298:                     io:format("IsVisible = ~p~nIsHidden = ~p~n", [IsVisible, IsHidden]),
 2299:                     io:format("Response from ~p: ~p~n", [Node, Msg]),
 2300:                     rpc:cast(Node, erlang, halt, []),
 2301:                     catch erlang:port_close(Port),
 2302:                     TestNode = node(Pid),
 2303:                     TestNode = Node,
 2304:                     case NetTickTime == undefined of
 2305:                         true ->
 2306:                             {ok, DefNTT} = application:get_env(kernel, net_ticktime),
 2307:                             DefNTT = NTT;
 2308:                         false ->
 2309:                             NetTickTime = NTT
 2310:                     end,
 2311:                     case DistListen == false orelse Hidden == true of
 2312:                         true ->
 2313:                             true = IsHidden,
 2314:                             false = IsVisible;
 2315:                         false ->
 2316:                             false = IsHidden,
 2317:                             true = IsVisible
 2318:                     end
 2319:             end,
 2320:             ok;
 2321: 	Error ->
 2322: 	    error({open_port_failed, TestNode, Error})
 2323:     end.
 2324: 
 2325: net_kernel_start_cmdline(TestName, Name, NetTickTime, NetTickIntensity, DistListen, Hidden) ->
 2326:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2327:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
 2328: 	       {ok, [[Prg]]} -> Prg;
 2329: 	       _ -> error(missing_progname)
 2330: 	   end,
 2331:     NameDomain = case net_kernel:longnames() of
 2332:                      false -> "shortnames";
 2333:                      true -> "longnames"
 2334:                  end,
 2335:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2336:     NameStr = atom_to_list(Name),
 2337:     Prog ++ " -noinput -noshell -detached -pa " ++ Pa
 2338: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
 2339: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 2340: 	++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " net_kernel_start_do_test "
 2341: 	++ atom_to_list(TestName) ++ " " ++ atom_to_list(node()) ++ " "
 2342:         ++ NameStr ++ " " ++ NameDomain
 2343:         ++ case NetTickTime == undefined of
 2344:                true ->
 2345:                    "";
 2346:                false ->
 2347:                    " " ++ integer_to_list(NetTickTime) ++
 2348:                        " " ++ integer_to_list(NetTickIntensity)
 2349:            end
 2350:         ++ case DistListen == undefined of
 2351:                true -> "";
 2352:                false -> " " ++ atom_to_list(DistListen)
 2353:            end
 2354:         ++ case Hidden == undefined of
 2355:                true -> "";
 2356:                false -> " " ++ atom_to_list(Hidden)
 2357:            end.
 2358: 
 2359: net_kernel_start_do_test([TestName, TestNode, Name, NameDomain]) ->
 2360:     net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, list_to_atom(Name),
 2361:                              #{name_domain => list_to_atom(NameDomain)});
 2362: 
 2363: net_kernel_start_do_test([TestName, TestNode, Name, NameDomain, NetTickTime, NetTickIntensity,
 2364:                           DistListen, Hidden]) ->
 2365:     net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, list_to_atom(Name),
 2366:                              #{net_ticktime => list_to_integer(NetTickTime),
 2367:                                name_domain => list_to_atom(NameDomain),
 2368:                                net_tickintensity => list_to_integer(NetTickIntensity),
 2369:                                dist_listen => list_to_atom(DistListen),
 2370:                                hidden => list_to_atom(Hidden)}).
 2371: 
 2372: net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, Name, Options) ->
 2373:     case net_kernel:start(Name, Options) of
 2374:         {ok, _Pid} ->
 2375:             case maps:get(dist_listen, Options, true) of
 2376:                 false -> receive after 3000 -> ok end;
 2377:                 true -> ok
 2378:             end,
 2379:             Tester = {list_to_atom(TestName), list_to_atom(TestNode)},
 2380:             Tester ! {i_am_alive, self(), node(), net_kernel:get_net_ticktime()},
 2381:             receive after 60000 -> ok end,
 2382:             erlang:halt();
 2383:         Error ->
 2384:             erlang:halt(lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~p", [Error])))
 2385:     end.
 2386: 
 2387: differing_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2388:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2389:     Node = node(),
 2390:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2391:     [] = nodes(),
 2392:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2393: 
 2394:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2395: 
 2396:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2397:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2398:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2399:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2400:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2401:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, NodeACookie ),
 2402:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2403:         start_node( "-hidden", NodeAName, "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL ),
 2404:     try
 2405: 
 2406:         %% Verify the cluster
 2407:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2408:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2409: 
 2410:         %% Start node B with another different cookie
 2411:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2412:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2413:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2414:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2415:         true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeB, NodeBCookie ),
 2416:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2417:             start_node( "-hidden", NodeBName, "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL ),
 2418:         try
 2419: 
 2420:             %% Verify the cluster
 2421:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2422:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2423:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2424: 
 2425:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect
 2426:             %% before correcting the cookie configuration
 2427:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2428:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2429: 
 2430:             %% Configure cookie and connect node A -> B
 2431:             true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeB, NodeBCookie] ),
 2432:             pong = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2433: 
 2434:             %% Verify the cluster
 2435:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2436:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2437:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2438:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2439:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2440:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2441:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2442: 
 2443:             %% Disconnect node A from B
 2444:             true = rpc:call( NodeB, net_kernel, disconnect, [NodeA] ),
 2445: 
 2446:             %% Verify the cluster
 2447:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2448:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2449:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2450: 
 2451:             %% Reconnect, now node B -> A
 2452:             pong = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2453: 
 2454:             %% Verify the cluster
 2455:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2456:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2457:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2458:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2459:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ))
 2460: 
 2461:         after
 2462:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2463:         end
 2464:     after
 2465:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2466:     end,
 2467:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2468:     ok.
 2469: 
 2470: cmdline_setcookie_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2471:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2472:     Node = node(),
 2473:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2474:     [] = nodes(),
 2475:     NodeL = atom_to_list(Node),
 2476:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2477:     NodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2478:     NodeCookieL = atom_to_list(NodeCookie),
 2479: 
 2480:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2481: 
 2482:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2483:     %% and cookie configuration of mother node
 2484:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2485:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2486:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2487:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2488:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2489:         start_node(
 2490:           "-hidden", NodeAName,
 2491:           "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++NodeCookieL ),
 2492: 
 2493:     try
 2494: 
 2495:         %% Verify the cluster
 2496:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2497:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2498:         NodeCookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2499: 
 2500:         true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeACookie] ),
 2501: 
 2502:         %% Start node B with different cookie
 2503:         %% and cookie configuration of mother node and node A
 2504:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2505:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2506:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2507:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2508:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2509:             start_node(
 2510:               "-hidden", NodeBName,
 2511:               "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL++" "
 2512:               "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++NodeCookieL++" "
 2513:               "-setcookie "++atom_to_list(NodeA)++" "++NodeACookieL ),
 2514: 
 2515:         try
 2516: 
 2517:             %% Verify the cluster
 2518:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2519:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2520:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2521:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2522:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2523: 
 2524:             %% Connect the nodes
 2525:             pong = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2526: 
 2527:             %% Verify the cluster
 2528:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2529:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2530:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2531:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2532:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2533:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2534:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ))
 2535: 
 2536:         after
 2537:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2538:         end
 2539:     after
 2540:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2541:     end,
 2542:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2543:     ok.
 2544: 
 2545: connection_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2546:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2547:     Node = node(),
 2548:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2549:     [] = nodes(),
 2550:     NodeL = atom_to_list(Node),
 2551:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2552: 
 2553:     %% Start node A with dedicated connection cookie
 2554:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2555:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2556:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2557:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2558:     true = NodeACookie =/= erlang:get_cookie(),
 2559:     ConnectionCookieL = BaseName++"_connectionCookie",
 2560:     ConnectionCookie = list_to_atom(ConnectionCookieL),
 2561:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, ConnectionCookie ),
 2562:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2563:         start_node(
 2564:           "", NodeAName,
 2565:           "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL++" "
 2566:           "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++ConnectionCookieL ),
 2567: 
 2568:     try
 2569: 
 2570:         %% Verify the cluster
 2571:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(),
 2572:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [] ),
 2573:         NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2574:         ConnectionCookie = rpc:call( NodeA, auth, get_cookie, [Node]),
 2575:         ConnectionCookie = erlang:get_cookie( NodeA )
 2576: 
 2577:     after
 2578:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2579:     end,
 2580:     [] = nodes(),
 2581:     ok.
 2582: 
 2583: dyn_differing_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2584:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2585:     MotherNode = node(),
 2586:     true = MotherNode =/= nonode@nohost,
 2587:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2588:     MotherNodeL = atom_to_list(MotherNode),
 2589:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2590:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2591:     MotherNodeCookieL = atom_to_list(MotherNodeCookie),
 2592:     register(?FUNCTION_NAME, self()),
 2593: 
 2594:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2595:     %% and cookie configuration of mother node
 2596:     DynNodeCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2597:     DynNodeCookie = list_to_atom(DynNodeCookieL),
 2598:     {_NF1, Port1} =
 2599:         start_node_unconnected(
 2600:           "-setcookie "++MotherNodeL++" "++MotherNodeCookieL,
 2601:           undefined, DynNodeCookie,
 2602:           ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
 2603:           ["ddc_remote_run", MotherNodeL, "cmdline", MotherNodeCookieL] ),
 2604: 
 2605:     dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port1),
 2606: 
 2607:     %% Same again, but use erlang:set_cookie/2 to set MotherNodeCookie
 2608:     {_NF2, Port2} =
 2609:         start_node_unconnected(
 2610:           "",
 2611:           undefined, DynNodeCookie,
 2612:           ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
 2613:           ["ddc_remote_run", MotherNodeL, "set_cookie", MotherNodeCookieL] ),
 2614: 
 2615:     dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port2).
 2616: 
 2617: 
 2618: dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port) ->
 2619:     receive
 2620:         { MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, DynNode } ->
 2621:             [ DynNode ] = nodes(hidden),
 2622:             [ MotherNode ] = rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2623:             DynNodeCookie = rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, get_cookie, [] ),
 2624:             MotherNodeCookie =
 2625:                 rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, get_cookie, [MotherNode] ),
 2626:             {ddc_remote_run, DynNode} !
 2627:                 {MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNode},
 2628: 
 2629:             0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port),
 2630: 
 2631:             [] = nodes(hidden),
 2632:             ok;
 2633:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 2634:             io:format("~p: ~s", [Port, Data]),
 2635:             dyn_differing_cookies(
 2636:               MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port);
 2637:         Other ->
 2638:             error({unexpected, Other})
 2639:     end.
 2640: 
 2641: ddc_remote_run(MotherNode, [SetCookie, MotherNodeCookieL]) ->
 2642:     nonode@nohost = node(),
 2643:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2644:     MotherNodeCookie = list_to_atom(MotherNodeCookieL),
 2645:     case SetCookie of
 2646:         "set_cookie" ->
 2647:             erlang:set_cookie(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie);
 2648:         "cmdline" ->
 2649:             ok
 2650:     end,
 2651:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(MotherNode),
 2652:     true = net_kernel:connect_node( MotherNode ),
 2653:     [ MotherNode ] = nodes(hidden),
 2654:     DynNode = node(),
 2655:     [ DynNode ] = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2656:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie( MotherNode ),
 2657:     MotherNodeCookie = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, get_cookie, [] ),
 2658:     %% Here we get the mother node's default cookie
 2659:     MotherNodeCookie = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, get_cookie, [DynNode] ),
 2660:     DynNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2661:     register(ddc_remote_run, self() ),
 2662:     {dyn_differing_cookies, MotherNode} !
 2663:         {MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, DynNode},
 2664:     receive
 2665:         { MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNode } ->
 2666:             true = disconnect_node( MotherNode ),
 2667:             [] = nodes(hidden),
 2668:             ok;
 2669:         Other ->
 2670:             error({unexpected, Other})
 2671:     end.
 2672: 
 2673: xdg_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2674:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2675: 
 2676:     TestHome = filename:join(PrivDir, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2677:     ok = file:make_dir(TestHome),
 2678: 
 2679:     HomeEnv = case os:type() of
 2680:               {win32, _} ->
 2681:                   [Drive | Path] = filename:split(TestHome),
 2682:                   [{"APPDATA", filename:join(TestHome,"AppData")},
 2683:                    {"HOMEDRIVE", Drive}, {"HOMEPATH", filename:join(Path)}];
 2684:               _ ->
 2685:                   [{"HOME", TestHome}]
 2686:           end,
 2687: 
 2688:     NodeOpts = #{ env => HomeEnv ++
 2689:                       [{"ERL_CRASH_DUMP", filename:join([TestHome,"erl_crash.dump"])}],
 2690:                   connection => 0 },
 2691: 
 2692:     %% Test that a default .erlang.cookie file is created
 2693:     {ok, CreatorPeer, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2694:     UserConfig = peer:call(CreatorPeer, filename, basedir, [user_config,"erlang"]),
 2695:     ?assert(peer:call(CreatorPeer, filelib, is_regular,
 2696:                       [filename:join(TestHome, ".erlang.cookie")])),
 2697:     OrigCookie = peer:call(CreatorPeer, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2698:     peer:stop(CreatorPeer),
 2699: 
 2700:     %% Test that the $HOME/.erlang.cookie file takes precedence over XDG
 2701:     XDGCookie = filename:join([UserConfig, ".erlang.cookie"]),
 2702:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(XDGCookie),
 2703:     ok = file:write_file(XDGCookie, "Me want cookie!"),
 2704:     {ok, XDGFI} = file:read_file_info(XDGCookie),
 2705:     ok = file:write_file_info(XDGCookie, XDGFI#file_info{ mode = 8#600 }),
 2706: 
 2707:     {ok, Peer, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2708: 
 2709:     ?assertEqual(OrigCookie, peer:call(Peer, erlang, get_cookie, [])),
 2710: 
 2711:     peer:stop(Peer),
 2712: 
 2713:     %% Check that XDG cookie works after we delete the $HOME cookie
 2714:     HomeCookie = filename:join(TestHome, ".erlang.cookie"),
 2715:     {ok, HomeFI} = file:read_file_info(HomeCookie),
 2716:     ok = file:write_file_info(HomeCookie, HomeFI#file_info{ mode = 8#777 }),
 2717:     ok = file:delete(HomeCookie),
 2718:     {ok, Peer2, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2719:     ?assertEqual('Me want cookie!', peer:call(Peer2, erlang, get_cookie, [])),
 2720: 
 2721:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 2722: 
 2723:     ok.
 2724: 
 2725: allowed(_Config) ->
 2726:     %% inspired by differing_cookies/1
 2727:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2728:     Node = node(),
 2729:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2730:     [] = nodes(),
 2731:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2732: 
 2733:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2734: 
 2735:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2736:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2737:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2738:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2739:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2740:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, NodeACookie ),
 2741:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2742:         start_node( "-hidden", NodeAName, "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL ),
 2743:    
 2744:     %% allow Node on NodeA so that other connections are dismissed
 2745:     {ok,[]} = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2746:     ok = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allow, [[Node]]),
 2747:     {ok,[Node]} = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2748:     try
 2749: 
 2750:         %% Verify the cluster
 2751:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2752:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2753: 
 2754:         %% Start node B with another different cookie
 2755:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2756:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2757:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2758:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2759:         true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeB, NodeBCookie ),
 2760:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2761:             start_node( "-hidden", NodeBName, "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL ),
 2762: 
 2763:         try
 2764: 
 2765:             %% Verify the cluster
 2766:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2767:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2768:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2769: 
 2770:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect
 2771:             %% before correcting the cookie configuration
 2772:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2773:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2774: 
 2775:             %% Configure cookie and connect node A -> B
 2776:             true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeB, NodeBCookie] ),
 2777:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect
 2778:             %% even though they have the same cookie
 2779:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2780:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2781: 
 2782:             %% Allow node B on node A
 2783:             ok = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allow, [[NodeB]]),
 2784:             {ok,[Node,NodeB]} = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2785:             pong = rpc:call(NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB]),
 2786:             pong = rpc:call(NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA]),
 2787: 
 2788:             %% Verify that A can connect to B
 2789:             %% even though they have different cookies
 2790:             true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeB, NodeACookie] ),
 2791:             pong = rpc:call(NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB]),
 2792:             pong = rpc:call(NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA]),
 2793: 
 2794:             %% Verify the cluster
 2795:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2796:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2797:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2798:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2799:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2800:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2801:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2802: 
 2803:             %% Disconnect node A from B
 2804:             true = rpc:call( NodeB, net_kernel, disconnect, [NodeA] ),
 2805: 
 2806:             %% Verify the cluster
 2807:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2808:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2809:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2810: 
 2811:             %% Test non-registered process
 2812:             %% 'net_kernel' is registered to a process
 2813:             %% so we unregister it to test the output 'ignored'
 2814:             ok = rpc:call(NodeA, erts_internal, dynamic_node_name, [false]),
 2815:             true = rpc:call(NodeA, erlang, unregister, [net_kernel]),
 2816:             ignored = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allow, [[NodeB]])
 2817:         after
 2818:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2819:         end
 2820:     after
 2821:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2822:     end,
 2823:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2824:     ok.
 2825: 
 2826: %% Misc. functions
 2827: 
 2828: equal_sets(A, B) ->
 2829:     S = lists:sort(A),
 2830:     case lists:sort(B) of
 2831:         S ->
 2832:             ok;
 2833:         _ ->
 2834:             erlang:error({not_equal_sets, A, B})
 2835:     end.
 2836: 
 2837: run_dist_configs(Func, Config) ->
 2838:     GetOptProlog = "-proto_dist gen_tcp -gen_tcp_dist_output_loop "
 2839:         ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " ",
 2840:     GenTcpDistTest = case get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type() of
 2841:                          default ->
 2842:                              {"gen_tcp_dist", "-proto_dist gen_tcp"};
 2843:                          size ->
 2844:                              {"gen_tcp_dist (get_size)",
 2845:                               GetOptProlog ++ "dist_cntrlr_output_test_size"}
 2846:                      end,
 2847:     lists:map(fun ({DCfgName, DCfg}) ->
 2848:                       io:format("~n~n=== Running ~s configuration ===~n~n",
 2849:                                 [DCfgName]),
 2850:                       Func(DCfg, Config)
 2851:               end,
 2852:               [{"default", ""}, GenTcpDistTest]).
 2853: 
 2854: start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2855:     Me = self(),
 2856:     Go = make_ref(),
 2857:     io:format("STARTING: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server~n",[]),
 2858:     {P, M} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 2859:                                    register(gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server, self()),
 2860:                                    Me ! Go,
 2861:                                    gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server()
 2862:                            end),
 2863:     receive
 2864:         Go ->
 2865:             ok;
 2866:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, _} ->
 2867:             start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server()
 2868:     end.
 2869: 
 2870: kill_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2871:     case whereis(gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server) of
 2872:         undefined ->
 2873:             ok;
 2874:         Pid ->
 2875:             exit(Pid,kill),
 2876:             %% Sync death, before continuing...
 2877:             false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid)
 2878:     end.
 2879: 
 2880: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2881:     Type = case abs(erlang:monotonic_time(second)) rem 2 of
 2882:                0 -> default;
 2883:                1 -> size
 2884:            end,
 2885:     gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(Type).
 2886: 
 2887: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(Type) ->
 2888:     receive
 2889:         {From, Ref} ->
 2890:             From ! {Ref, Type},
 2891:             NewType = case Type of
 2892:                           default -> size;
 2893:                           size -> default
 2894:                       end,
 2895:             gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(NewType)
 2896:     end.
 2897: 
 2898: get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type() ->
 2899:     Ref = make_ref(),
 2900:     try
 2901:         gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server ! {self(), Ref},
 2902:         receive
 2903:             {Ref, Type} ->
 2904:                 Type
 2905:         end
 2906:     catch
 2907:         error:badarg ->
 2908:             start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
 2909:             get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type()
 2910:     end.
 2911: 
 2912: dist_cntrlr_output_test_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2913:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2914:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, true),
 2915:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2916:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, false),
 2917:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2918:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, true),
 2919:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2920:     dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket).
 2921: 
 2922: dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2923:     receive
 2924:         dist_data ->
 2925:             %% Outgoing data from this node...
 2926:             dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket);
 2927:         _ ->
 2928:             ok %% Drop garbage message...
 2929:     end,
 2930:     dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket).
 2931: 
 2932: dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2933:     case erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data(DHandle) of
 2934:         none ->
 2935:             erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data_notification(DHandle);
 2936:         {Size, Data} ->
 2937:             ok = ensure_iovec(Data),
 2938:             Size = erlang:iolist_size(Data),
 2939:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data),
 2940:             dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket)
 2941:     end.
 2942: 
 2943: ensure_iovec([]) ->
 2944:     ok;
 2945: ensure_iovec([X|Y]) when is_binary(X) ->
 2946:     ensure_iovec(Y).
 2947: 
 2948: monitor_node_state() ->
 2949:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2950:     MonitoringNodes = erts_debug:get_internal_state(monitoring_nodes),
 2951:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
 2952:     MonitoringNodes.
 2953: 
 2954: 
 2955: check_no_nodedown_nodeup(TimeOut) ->
 2956:     receive
 2957: 	{nodeup, _, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodeup, Msg});
 2958: 	{nodeup, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodeup, Msg});
 2959: 	{nodedown, _, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, Msg});
 2960: 	{nodedown, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, Msg})
 2961:     after TimeOut ->
 2962: 	    ok
 2963:     end.
 2964: 
 2965: print_my_messages() ->
 2966:     {messages, Messages} = process_info(self(), messages),
 2967:     io:format("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2968:     ok.
 2969: 
 2970: 
 2971: sleep(T) -> receive after T * 1000 -> ok end.	
 2972: 
 2973: start_node(_DCfg, Name, Param, this) ->
 2974:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2975:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [this]}]);
 2976: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, "this") ->
 2977:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2978:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [this]}]);
 2979: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, Rel) when is_atom(Rel) ->
 2980:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2981:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [{release, atom_to_list(Rel)}]}]);
 2982: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, Rel) when is_list(Rel) ->
 2983:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2984:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [{release, Rel}]}]).
 2985: 
 2986: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param) ->
 2987:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2988:     test_server:start_node(Name, slave, [{args, NewParam}]).
 2989: 
 2990: start_node(DCfg, Name) ->
 2991:     start_node(DCfg, Name, "").
 2992: 
 2993: stop_node(Node) ->
 2994:     test_server:stop_node(Node).
 2995: 
 2996: get_nodenames(N, T) ->
 2997:     get_nodenames(N, T, []).
 2998: 
 2999: get_nodenames(0, _, Acc) ->
 3000:     Acc;
 3001: get_nodenames(N, T, Acc) ->
 3002:     U = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 3003:     get_nodenames(N-1, T, [list_to_atom(atom_to_list(T)
 3004: 					++ "-"
 3005: 					++ ?MODULE_STRING
 3006: 					++ "-"
 3007: 					++ integer_to_list(U)) | Acc]).
 3008: 
 3009: get_numbered_nodenames(N, T) ->
 3010:     get_numbered_nodenames(N, T, []).
 3011: 
 3012: get_numbered_nodenames(0, _, Acc) ->
 3013:     Acc;
 3014: get_numbered_nodenames(N, T, Acc) ->
 3015:     U = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 3016:     NL = [list_to_atom(atom_to_list(T) ++ integer_to_list(N)
 3017: 		       ++ "-"
 3018: 		       ++ ?MODULE_STRING
 3019: 		       ++ "-"
 3020: 		       ++ integer_to_list(U)) | Acc],
 3021:     get_numbered_nodenames(N-1, T, NL).
 3022: 
 3023: wait_until(Fun) ->
 3024:     case Fun() of
 3025: 	true ->
 3026: 	    ok;
 3027: 	_ ->
 3028: 	    receive
 3029: 	    after 100 ->
 3030: 		    wait_until(Fun)
 3031: 	    end
 3032:     end.
 3033: 
 3034: repeat(Fun, 0) when is_function(Fun) ->
 3035:     ok;
 3036: repeat(Fun, N) when is_function(Fun), is_integer(N), N > 0 ->
 3037:     Fun(),
 3038:     repeat(Fun, N-1).
 3039: 
 3040: no_msgs(Wait) ->
 3041:     receive after Wait -> no_msgs() end.
 3042: 
 3043: no_msgs() ->
 3044:     {messages, []} = process_info(self(), messages).
 3045: 
 3046: block_emu(Ms) ->
 3047:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 3048:     Res = erts_debug:set_internal_state(block, Ms),
 3049:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
 3050:     Res.
 3051: 
 3052:
